For our reservation we requested connecting rooms, knowing full well this wouldn't happen, as they can't guarantee such things. Why? No clue.   Going in with this mindset, upon check-in, the staff member mentioned that we were "given an upgrade" to a suite and a $50 dining credit. Well, that sounds nice...until we get to the room and learn that we're adjacent to service elevators and an "employee area." Now I know what the suite was available.   Needless to say, our night was filled with sounds of elevators, carts banging into the wall that our room shared with the employee area, and loud conversations between employees. Good times!

We were not disappointed; however, wished that the Hotel may consider bringing

I guess they are either short staffed or efficient during my 4 nights.  I also guess I'm used to more friendlier places. Manager Response: Dear sfprincessjess,  Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to ensure that our property team works hard to provide experiences that allow our guests to be at their best. The service in the restaurant is quite slow - it's like the property isn't sure if it really wants to offer a restaurant (must be hard to compete w/ a full fledged mall across the street).  The garage is a hike, almost a deterrent such that you feel compelled to use the

Manager Response: Dear mdurty,  Thank you so much for your valued feedback regarding to your experience.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to improve our service and will share your comments with the appropriate leadership to make your future visits with us meet your needs.

Summary: This is a solid option for business travel. I arrived late and was told "there are no rooms" so for 175 extra points would I be willing to have a "parlor" room that had a living room and a murphy bed. I said no and suddenly there was a room available. I thought that was a bit odd, but the person at check-in didn't push the issue. The room was a fairly standard Westin. The gym was fine - small and with older equipment, but suitable. The hotel is located about 7 miles from Irvine and close to area business which makes it convenient for business travel. Had breakfast at the restaurant in the morning and it was good and quick. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear MattK,  It is so important to be able to meet your specific needs as a business hotel and we are delighted to hear we just did that.  We hope that you will stay with us again when you stay in Costa Mesa.

Summary: The sleeping experience in their "heavenly" beds, as they called them, is wonderful. Since the moment you get into the bed, it's just amazing, the clean, ironed feeling of going into their beds.  The views are nice.  The air conditioning is quiet, a must for me, and the shades block the light completely. - I can really sleep here all night... The bathrooms are comfortable and super clean with everything you need, Westin is a great quality brand!!!
Manager Response: Dear Monica F,  We are enriched to hear that you felt well rested when with us.  The Heavenly Bed experience is truly one that is unforgettable.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Nice pool see through my room  Room is nice and clean  Restroom too Service and location both good  But the parking very inconvenient  Needs to crossing the street to parking  And cost $20 for a day  Except the parking. Everything good  Still recommends if don't mind of parking
Manager Response: Dear Sayo S,  We are glad we were able to meet your business needs.  We look forward to having you with us on your next stay.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel due to its location to South Coast Plaza. The rooms are comfortable while not outstanding, the bathroom is fine though the lack of amenities was a little disappointing.I booked the room to include breakfast, though on booking I found I was given a voucher that limited you to a certain value. No mention of this on booking and a little confusing. The hotel is good, though I always had the feeling they were trying to save on costs on the small things that you expect to be included from staying at a hotel of this level. Can't comment on the concierge as he/her was never at the desk every time we wanted to make use of this service. The other issue we had was getting a taxi and having to wait 30 mins before one arrived.So all in all just okay.
Manager Response: Dear Alastair4, Thank you for letting us know how we can better communicate the booking process.  We will continue to work on providing service that is meaningful to our valued guests.

Summary: As I've mentioned before the valet is the hotels first and last impression... Unfortunately it is under construction and kind of covered in an attractive way... Oh well they've put in a temporary door and it's fine but the staff was so lackluster... Almost uninterested.  Lobby is nice and was beautiful for the holidays and check in was smooth and friendly.  Room was very nice and had a great view.   The location is so perfect for the theater, for shopping at South Coast Plaza...and for great dining.   Grab a drink in the lobby bar after a day of shopping and then walk to any of the great nearby restaurants or go see a performance at Segerstrom.   Minutes from the airport this nice hotel is perfectly situated for business and pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Losjacksons,  We value your feedback regarding to our hotel and appreciate you letting us know that you felt our hotel was a perfect location.  We apologize that you were inconvenienced in any way when with us.  We genuinely care about your experience with us and want to provide a seamless transition upon arrival.

Summary: We selected this property for its consistent quality, location and the fact that it is pet friendly.  The hotel is lovely and well located next to the huge South Coast Shopping Plazza.  One can literally walk from the hotel to the Plaza to shop or enjoy one of several restaurants.  When we checked in we were given a tag for our dog and instructed that he should wear it at all times.  We were also given a list of local resources for our pet that included dog-friendly restaurants at South Coast Plaza and asked to sign an acknowledgement that we would not leave our dog unattended in the room.  We were made aware that if we did so, and the dog barked, Animal Control would be called to remove the dog.  So much for being made to feel welcome at The Westin!  When we got to our room, I
Manager Response: Dear MerriWanderer,  Thank you so much for informing us of your experience.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to rectify the failures in service it appears you experienced.   We want you to feel welcome with us when you are traveling with your dog.  We have shared your feedback with our team to ensure we continue to put into place opportunities for our guest to feel in control with all the needs of their family and pets.  We hope you will come see us again and give us another opportunity.    Thank you

Summary: The close proximity to South Coast Plaza makes this hotel a favorite for the women in my family. The room was nice and clean. The neighborhood is nice a safe with plenty of restaurants within walking distance. The traffic during the holidays can be chaotic.
Manager Response: Dear Sfascu,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your shopping destination visit.  We are positioned in a great location to make the shopping in walking distance so you don't have to deal with all the traffic.  Glad we could be your hotel of choice.

Summary Heading: Havent arrived yet and know I wont be back
Summary: I booked 2 rooms at this hotel. I am a Starwood Platinum member and travel extensively. Had a gap in my schedule that allowed golf so wanted to switch my prepaid reservation to the St. Regis for a stay and play. The SPG concierge was wonderful and called the hotel to see if I could cancel or even take a credit for a later stay and was told no, period. I love Starwood hotels, plans unfortunately change, I have been able to change prepaid reservations before, but a flat no was the only response from the GM of the property. I can only imagine the level of customer service in a hotel property where the GM does not believe in consumer relations. I will always stay at SPG properties but never at this one again.
Manager Response: Dear Upincumer,  Our sincerest apologies we did not get the opportunity to provide you with the type of service you expect and deserve at Westin.

Summary: Nice location across from South Coast Plaza. Parking for valet is $33 a day and only $5 less for self parking. Very clean and modern. Much improved since my last visit almost a decade ago.Expect some wait at check in and getting car from valet. Overall service good. Rooms are nice
Manager Response: Dear 625RL  Thank you for returning to our hotel from your last stay.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed it and for sharing your feedback on the pricing.

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed at this hotel and both stays were relaxing and very enjoyable. I must mention that Stacey O. at the front desk was amazing. She handled our check in with ease. She took into consideration all our requests and gave us exactly what we were looking for and more! She was knowledgeable and exceptionally friendly. Our room was spacious and clean. The beds are so comfortable. We had an incredible view of the 90 foot plus decorated Christmas tree outside our window. (It sadly burned down at the end of our stay. Luckily there were no injuries or damage to the hotel or surrounding buildings.)The interior of the hotel was beautifully decorated for the holidays.  I will be returning. Westin, you have me hooked!
Manager Response: Dear Moxietravel,  We are glad you could stay with us during the holiday and that you had a wonderful stay.  We are very excited to have you with us again.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, next to South Coast Plaza
Summary: The Westin is in a great location, near the mall, a group of restaurants and about 10-15 minutes from Orange County John Wayne Santa Ana airport (SNA). Upscale Starwood property, clean and updated rooms
Manager Response: Dear James M,  We are glad to hear that you felt the location was great for your visit.  The convenience of everything at your finger tips can make all the difference.

Summary: The location of this Westin can't be beat. If you love shopping, you have direct access to South Coast Plaza. The hotel is also central to several major freeways and a short drive from John Wayne Airport. Parking is a surcharge, but I actually didn't have a car while I was there so it was never an issue. Even without a car, I found plenty of dining options within walking distance.  Room and service is consistent with the SPG/Westin brand. My room had a great view over Orange County. Not that the OC is majestically beautiful, but it was nice to have an open view of something as opposed to another building directly in front of me.   Pool is on the roof of part of the hotel, so it feels more secluded given the traffic surrounding the hotel. It's not a huge pool but plenty big, and
Manager Response: Dear StephaniP,  Thank you for staying with us at Westin.  We understand how hectic travel can be so it is nice that our property makes it easy for you and enjoyable.  Look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I have traveled for work and pleasure for the last 15 years and have spent 2000+ nights in hotels. I stay here when working in Irvine and it is a well run hotel.  It is across the street from a large mall that offers some decent causal and better dining options by simply walking across the connecting bridge.  the staff is very nice and goes out of their way to make sure you enjoy your stay. Several floors are under renovation and they close the whole floor off for this. I've neve hear any noise or had an issue with the renovation.  I've only stayed in rooms that had already been renovated and I found them to be clean and comfortable. Rooms are average sized and I've never been upgrade to anything past the standard room so I don't think upgrades occur frequently at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Triptaker447,  We are glad that you enjoyed your business trip with us.  We look forward to having you with us again on your next trip.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Overall impression of this Westin was very nice!  The front desk staff was nice, the room was fantastic, clean, updated, modern and comfortable, The food for breakfast was great.  I have nothing but positive to say about my experience here!  Good job!
Manager Response: Dear Cay3c,  We enjoy hearing your positive experience and look forward to having you with us next time. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The property has a great convenient location adjacent to the freeways and a foot bridge directly across from South Coast Plaza Mall.  The Basic category rooms are appropriately sized and all recently renovated.  We are regular guests and all stays to date have been foolproof.  One notable highlight is the prompt and exceptional staff, especially in that required time sensitive forgotten items to be fedex overnight.
Manager Response: Dear EricmL6111TW,  Thank you for letting us know that our team gave you exceptional service.  We hope to see you on your next stay with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I've stayed at many Westin's over the past few years and have had consistent experiences. It's been a reliable mid level hotel. My experience at the Westin South Coast Plaza was by far my worst experience at a Westin and probably one of the most disappointing hotel stays I've ever had. The room cost $380 a night and it had a Murphy style bed. I was not told that it wasn't a normal room and with the hotel sold out I had no chance to change rooms. The bed was tiny and closed into a closet. The room number was 528 and I recommend no one stay in it. If I had been there with my wife we would not fit in the bed. I cannot believe the Westin had the nerve to book the room at that rate and not mention the bed is in the closet.  I will not stay at this money gouging hotel again. It
Manager Response: Dear Mrosco,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to improve our service we provide our valued guests.  We are committed to making each guest experience a positive one.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Booked this property last minute as I needed a place in the Orange County area and my options were limited.  Nice central location with easy access on/off access to the 405.  South Coast Plaza shopping center is within walking distance and a couple of great places to eat are only a short drive away.    Hotel itself was clean and accommodating to any requests.  Definitely more of a business hotel, but that wouldn't stop me from staying here again if in need of a place in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff H,  Thank you for staying with us.  We hope to see you on your next stay with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice hotel overall, what you expect of a Westin.... with the exception that if you are loyal to the brand, this hotel could care less. I tried to extend by one day, a reasonable request, and if they are booked, I get it. But I could have done without the "amused" attitude, not once, but twice, and the "we could care less" nonchalance when I asked them to keep an eye out for a cancellation that would save me from staying at a competitor brand. I'm really loyal to Starwood. Won't be staying at this hotel again though. Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear SavannahLa,  Our deepest apology that you felt that we did not deliver on your experience.  We take your feedback very serious and want to make each of our guests stays a seamless and memorable one.  We hope we get another opportunity to deliver for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, central location to everything!
Summary: My husband and I enjoyed a weekend away and had the pleasure of staying at this property.  The staff was so very friendly and helpful... They were so welcoming, no matter which staff we walked by or talked to they were always smiling! One lady in particular that really stood out was Autumn, I found her name memorable with the time of year, but her personality would stand out year around! My husband and I are not necessarily "morning" people but each time we would speak to Autumn over the phone or in person she was a positive ray of sunshine! All the staff was so kind, we will be staying here time and time again! Thank you for going that extra mile on making our stay so memorable...
Manager Response: Dear Kerri J, Thank you for taking the time to recognize one of our valued associates.  We will make sure she is recognized for her connection that she made with you.  We look forward to having you back with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Westin South Coast Plaza for five nights while we were in Orange County for a family wedding. We were greeted warmly at the check-in desk, check-in was quick, and our room was lovely -- comfortable queen beds, everything spotless. The room was quite large and looked out over the hotel pool. I liked the option of "going green" by hanging a tag on our door that let housekeeping know not to clean our room and give us new towels each day. (This also gave us a $5 voucher we could apply to other in-house expenses, such as breakfast.) The common spaces of this hotel are lovely and welcoming. The staff was courteous and helpful.  One thing that my husband and I found frustrating was that the in-room TV channels were very limited. There were only about ten
Manager Response: Dear Karen P,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad you felt the hotel services were excellent and the hotel had an upscale feel.  We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to your return with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel and very convenient to my client.  The restaurant in the hotel closed (even though the website they send you to on the in-house web indicates it is still available.  The food at the bar is a little limited, expensive (typical for this type of hotel) and kind of unremarkable.  The service is good, not great except for the valet and belly hops.  They were excellent.  The shuttle to and from John Wayne Airport is very nice and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear rhctraveler,  Thank you for staying with us and providing us with feedback.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to deliver on your expectations. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This place is a great hotel that caters to all needs. Wonderful beds and rooms with equally great dining options. Service is first class and everyone so helpful. Close to the shops and handy to the entire area. Nothing was too much trouble and the pool and gym hours are long enough to cater for both early and late options.
Manager Response: Dear CarnoCoffsH,  Providing first class service is our number on priority.  We are glad to hear that we delivered on your experience.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Have stayed here twice thus far in 2015 and would gladly stay again. Both times the staff were extremely professional and kind, even making sure we got the same room we had the first time because we liked it so much! Love that a lot of the staff are from international backgrounds.   The hotel just had a recent renovation that was all completed by June. Rooms and bathroom look great! Nice modern feel.   Never heard any neighbors, place was immaculately clean, and their beds are my favorite. It costs more than I'd like, but I can always depend on high quality from Westin.   Only con is that the parking garage is a small walk away and the daily cost is pretty darn high. You'd think that Westin could work out a deal to make it cheaper.
Manager Response: Dear Astoria3,  Thank you for staying with us.  It is great to hear that you felt that the hotel provided a calming environment that was refreshing.  We look forward to having you back with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Shop til you drop...and a great business location
Summary: Close to the airport....was here for business.  Walk across the bridge to South Coast Plaza.  Many good restaurants in the area.  Staff very attentive.  Wish you could get Starbucks points for buying in their Starbucks, but other than that was perfect for business travel.
Manager Response: Dear DMG33,  We are glad that you felt the staff was attentive to your needs.  We look forward to being your destination of choice when in the area.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great room for SPG Gold members
Summary: We stayed for several nights using points. We had a great room with a good view. Service was great and the salt water pool was very nice. Only down sides were the parking garage (if you self park it was sort of annoying) and there was no in room guide for amenities (it was not on the TV either). And there was no video check out. I waited in line at the desk to find out that I could have just dropped the keys and left. But overall a really nice experience.
Manager Response: Dear sushi4soup,  We are glad you had a really nice stay with us.  Hope to see you again on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: If the price is right then stay
Summary: The room is Westin standard . Clean , tidy . The bed , pillow and mattress is averaged but replacement soon .  The issue is the shower , hot water is not hot enough and water pressure is weak .  Check in and out is efficiency , location is next to shopping mall .
Manager Response: Dear Josco W,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are delighted that the accommodations you had met all your needs.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had a great time at the Westin South Coast Plaza for a two night getaway. From the checkin with Mary to Gregorio and Tony for room service everyone was friendly and took pride in the job. I also have to give kudos to Max Fisher for quickly handling a smoke alarm that a guest set off early on Saturday morning. It was very noisy and a quick phone call took care of it. Also in housekeeping Angela was trterrific quick phone call
Manager Response: Dear Katherine B,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize one of our valuable associates you encountered when with us.  We are excited to hear he was able to take care of you the way you needed.

Summary Heading: Hope not to have to stay here again.
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a conference for a total of six nights, spread out over two back-to-back weekends in August.  Given the price point, I was extremely disappointed.  First, when I checked in the first weekend, the bathroom in my room had not been cleaned.  There were dirty towels on the floor, used water glasses on the sink, and trash in the trash can.  About ten minutes after I called and asked to have someone come up and clean it, housekeeping arrived at my door with a stack of towels and nothing else.  When I noted that I hadn't asked for towels but needed someone to clean the bathroom, I got first a confused expression and then a dirty look.  Despite having no cleaning supplies whatsoever, the housekeeper went in to "clean" my bathroom and then left with her stack
Manager Response: Dear Scadazzle,  We truly appreciate receiving your feedback on how we can improve our service.  We are dedicated in making changes to better the experiences of all of our guests.  We hope we may get another opportunity to serve you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have come to expect a lot from the Westin brand, and globally, I've not been let down. I did not, however, expect the Westin at South Coast Plaza to be as impressive as it was.  I booked on the SPG website, and got a great deal for a weekend stay. The hotel is across the road from South Coast Plaza shopping mall, one of the best in California.  The staff at the hotel were all pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable. We were given a room overlooking the pool and fitness centre. The room was large and attractively furnished. There was a coffee machine, with Starbucks coffee provided. No minibar, but a fridge for your own food.  The lobby housed an attractive bar area, with huge windows looking out onto a waterfall and outdoor cafe seating. There was also a coffee bar which sold very
Manager Response: Dear Zucchinigirl,  Thank you for your positive feedback regarding to your experience.  Glad to hear that we made an emotional connection and you were able to unwind when you stayed with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This Westin, which is hard to go wrong with any SPG property, is located just across the street from South Coast Plaza. Actually, it is connected through a pedestrian bridge.  The pool is great while enjoying your favorite drink...sangrias are awesome!  We had a bit of noise since there was construction in our floor. We complained about it and management waived our parking fees for the inconvenience...thanks!  Walking distance to many good restaurants, including the fancy steak house Mastros, which I recommend you spoil yourself ordering the lobster mash potato.  Great service at the hotel and loved the lobby's decor.  Enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear Bernardo A, It is a pleasure to always serve our loyal guests.  Thank you for staying with us and letting us know how you felt.  It is great to hear that you loved our location. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, but location not so tourist fiendly
Summary: It's a Westin. If you've ever stayed at one, you know what level of service and amenities to expect. Everything inside is very nice, the beds are fantastic, sheets and towels are enviable. But it's location in Costa Mesa leaves something to be desired for the average tourist to Orange County. It is across the street from the South Coast Plaza shopping mall, an enormous, relatively high end mall, and adjacent to the Segerstrom Center for the Performing Arts and South Coast Repertory, if you are into theater or the symphony. It's also a good location for doing business in Costa Mesa or Irvine. But it is not convenient to the theme parks or the beaches. Note also that there is no street parking, and garage parking is $27 per night for self parking, and a little more for valet.
Manager Response: Dear Octrekster,  Thank you for your valued feedback regarding to your recent stay with us.  It sounds like you are Westin loyal.  We hope that you will continue to come to our Westin on your next visits to the area. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here on business for two nights.  I'm an SPG Gold member as was given a room on the 10th floor.  The room was larger then typical room and newly renovated in modern grey/dark wood tones.  Shower featured a large rainfall shower head with decent water pressure.  The gym was typical hotel gym size but featured a few weight benches, Dumbbells and around 8 cardio machines.  The gym had an open view of the outdoor pool so lots of natural light.  Slept well here room was quiet, also was in one of their meeting rooms all day on the 2nd floor and the room also featured large windows with Palm tree/building views.  I also dined at Mastros and Scott's to restaraunts within walking distance of the property.   I enjoyed my stay and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your loyalty as a Starwood Preferred Gold member.  We truly appreciate your feedback.  We are delighted to hear that you will be coming back because of how your experience was with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Westin, nice location close to businesses, and theme parks
Summary: This hotel is outstanding overall.  The furnishings and decor are very inviting, and of course the heavenly bed doesn't disappoint.  The staff that checked us in was extremely friendly, the room service dinner was amazing (when is room service as great as going to a nice restaurant - but this was excellent!) with the salmon being cooked perfectly.  I had the gluten-free French Toast for breakfast and it was surprisingly good.  The only gripe I had was with the price of parking.  If you self-park through the hotel, you pay more than if you self park in the same garage.  There is no special parking area, etc. so this makes absolutely no sense.  In addition, valet parking one night blocked nearly the entire road by leaving all the cars in front of the hotel, rather than placing
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We truly appreciate your fantastic feedback.  It is good that our team delivered on a friendly experience for you.  It sounds like we hit on all the aspects of your stay while with us.  Hope to have you back with us again.

Summary: The Westin Costa Mesa is the perfect hotel if you don't look for crowded hotel in LA. The eria is calm and relaxing. It's 15 min drive to Laguna Beach an Huntington Beach. The room was very clean with soft bed.
Manager Response: Dear Kate_LS87,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt our Heavenly Beds were soft and your room was clean.

Summary Heading: Very good business hotel for visit to Irvine area - nice gym, pool
Summary: My rating would be 4.5 stars:  This Westin does a good job for business travelers coming in and out of the Irvine area (e.g., flying in to John Wayne airport).  Hotel rooms were comfortable and newly refurbished -- shower was updated and well done.  Bed good, etc.   (There was a little freeway noise on the 11th floor but not loud enough to prevent sleep).  Room 1108 was King bed, nice and roomy, with a good desk and plenty of outlets for traveler's electronics.  Breakfast was good downstairs with the Carrot-Ginger smoothie a pleasant and different surprise; two thumbs up on the omelet.  Bar staff accomodated our need for late night coffee and snacks - with a smile.   Exercise center/gym has a number of treadmills and some free weights.  The gym does not have a lot of
Manager Response: Dear FredTravelVA,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  Glad to hear that you felt your business needs were taken care of.

Summary: Best way I can describe it is distinctly average at best. Annoying my 1 star review on their website was omitted ... So please be aware that the 4/5 star rating on their website is completely misleading given that they only seem to include comments that are not too damning!   The good points;  The area round the pool and loungers were good The green deal is a fantastic idea and one I took full advantage of The wi fi was a good speed The bed was comfortable   The bad points; Hugely overpriced for what you actually get. The food... Very poor. Again hugely over priced and very limited selection. Best off heading to South Coast plaza to eat. The staff - very inconsistent, never felt especially welcoming. When I first got there was struggling with 3 cases but the staff were more
Manager Response: Dear Mike J,  We hope that we can turn around the bad points that you mentioned about your experience around on your next stay.  We want to give you the experience you deserve and expect. Thank you  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for three nights and held a seminar for my company in their conference room.    The hotel staff was friendly, helpful and followed through.  I booked a conference room at the last minute and Darlene was beyond accommodating. The food was much better then expected.  I anticipated a cookie cutter hotel experience and I was wrong.     Not only did Darlene check in with me several times during the day but other members of the staff did as well.  It truly was so much more than I expected.    The hotel itself is centrally located and has a Starbucks coffee station in the lobby.  From the front desk staff to the the valet parking staff everyone was accommodating and friendly.  Side note: valet parking is $32 a day so be prepared for that!!!!! Self park was $28 so
Manager Response: Dear mfholland71,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt your stay was a "Lovely Experience."  It sounds like we were able to make all the aspects of your stay memorable.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Went to Los Angeles for a wedding and chose to stay at the Westin South Coast using my Starwood points, which is normally 12,000 per nite. For this August stay, the points were 16,000, which is a lot !! I stay here frequently and have a good relation with the hotel, although this stay, the service was seemly less than stellar. I contacted the hotel prior to arrival to request an upgrade, if possible (since I am Lifetime Platinum member). Normally, they respond with excellent customer service, but less than this time. Was disappointed, since I was using a lot of points for the stay.  The hotel is one freeway exit away from the airport and very handy location. Across the street from the shopping mecca, South Coast Plaza. I requested an early check in, which I was grateful that
Manager Response: Dear SusieJue,  Thank you so much for letting us know about your experience with us.  We truly care about how you felt when with us and want to make sure we make it right for you.  We look forward to the opportunity to deliver the service you expect and deserve. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was a WOW experience. Room was lovely, convenient to shopping mall and the $100 voucher helped my shopping spree. The bar staff were welcoming even though we were a little late returning back to the hotel. I would recommend this hotel. This was my third visit and I will return.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We are excited to hear that you will be back!  The location of the shopping is convenient. We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Again, what you expect from a Westin
Summary: Great property, attentive staff. Nice rooms, breakfast a bit overpriced for what you get but servers were all super. Convenient to South Coast Plaza and John Wayne Airport. Be sure to checkout the waterfall outside the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear BobPhibbs,  We are glad to hear that you had all the conveniences of your stay meet your needs.  We look forward to having you back with us. Guest Relations Manager.

Summary: The location is convenient if you are traveling in/out of SNA, but there's really nothing special about this hotel.  I guess being connected to the South Coast Plaza is a plus,  but then again, I don't know what's so great about that mall to begin with.  It's a $120/night property that often goes for $250+/night due to its location and it carries the Westin name, implying a 4 star property.  It's a little run down and only worth it if you get a decent rate.  The service is standard and you'll get a good night's sleep - just don't expect much more than that.
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thank you for staying with us and giving us your feedback regarding to your experience at our property.  We are committed to delivering on service that create memories that drive loyalty.  We hope we get another opportunity to provide that type of service for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It has been a few years since my last stay and I was pleasantly surprised by the recent remodel.  The bathroom only had a shower but the sliding door was something I'd like at home.  The vista from my top floor room was of Segerstrom Hall, SCP and the mountains in the distance.  While the view of the pool area from the fitness center's ellipticals or treadmills was a nice touch, there were no other machines (beyond a rack setup) due to lack of space.  The parking fees and limited breakfast amenity keep this from being a five star review.  Charging $27 for self parking in a nearly empty garage is ridiculous.  I chose this property due to my Starwood loyalty and the distance to the training location.  I will probably try another property the next time I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Terere2,  Thank you for informing us of your satisfaction with the transformation of our guest rooms.  We hope that you will give our property another try on your next visit to our area.  Thank you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have always enjoyed this property but this visit was exceptional.  We were upgraded upon arrival, always a pleasant surprise.  The rooms have been beautifully renovated, the staff was "above and beyond", the food both in the lounge and room service was excellent.  Love this place!
Manager Response: Dear Carol H,  Thank you for letting us know that your stay was "Outstanding."   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: From the moment I arrived at this Westin property I knew it was going to be a great stay even though it would be a short stay because of an early flight (6:00AM) out of LAX. From the moment I arrived it was 5 Star treatment, beginning with the parking attendants to the front desk personnel. I was greeted by a lovely young woman (who's name I forget, please forgive me) with a great smile and impeccable customer service skills. Once I arrived to my room I was once again reminded of why I plan my trips be they business or pleasure around SPG properties. I was upgraded to a suite because of my loyalty status with SPG and the room did not disappoint, having great amenities and a large bathroom. Like I said, when I am preparing from a trip my first order of business is to find where
Manager Response: Dear Dan M,  We are happy to hear that you felt our service is 5 Star.  We will share with our team that they are making a difference on our guest experience.  Thank you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, even nicer now that it's been completely remodeled
Summary: Westin South Coast Plaza has always been a good hotel in a great location, it however needed a facelift since it serves such a high class clientele (Newport Beach and South Coast Plaza high class shoppers) If finally was renovated and it looks great and it's very comfortable. Still needs a jacuzzi to complement their very nice pool/gym deck area Staff is nice, and very typical great sleep of the great Westin beds. Most of pictures posted on the Trip Advisor site are of the old hotel, looks much better now.
Manager Response: Dear Dnadler,  Thank you for staying with us and taking notice of the hotel transformation since our recent enhanced guest rooms. Look forward to having you back with us.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but watch your wallet!
Summary: This is actually a very decent hotel but there are several reasons behind the 2 stars.  First, I stayed at the hotel for 8 nights and was charged double each night for parking the rental car (an outrageous $27 for self park and $32 for valet).  I have called twice to get credit for the mistake (the second time being given the 3rd degree by the accounting manager who literally asked me how many cars I brought to the hotel!)    Second, I had several orders from Amazon delivered to the hotel to hold for me (I live in Colombia and it's tough to get many things delivered there).  The first set of packages were delivered and signed for according to Amazon.  According to the hotel when I checked in, there were no records of the deliveries.  Amazon gladly refunded and resent the orders.
Manager Response: Dear Brian J R,  Thank you for providing your valuable feedback regarding your stay.  We are dedicated to making right whatever concerns you have.  Please feel free to contact our manager on duty at the property if we can assist in any way to recover from your experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location close to a lot of shopping and restaurants in walking distance.  The staff is super friendly and always made you feel welcomed. From checking in to checking out, they always greeted you with a warm, genuine smile.  The valet guys are pretty awesome.  They always offered us bottled water to take along when we were waiting for our car even when we were checking out and always asked if we needed help with anything.   The room is very clean and comfortable.  Everything was nice and new.  We opted in for the Go Green program and although they did not come in to make our rooms (there really wasn't a need to) they did come in to replenish water and coffee daily.  Wi-Fi is free if you are a Starwood member, so I recommend signing up if you are not (it's
Manager Response: Dear AliCat0_0,  Good to hear that you felt that you had a "Great Stay."  Look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We loved this hotel and would definitely return. It is elegant, modern, clean, quiet and comfortable. The service was good and the view was great. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because you have to pay for any level of WiFi. For the money you are paying and the quality of the hotel, it should be included...even lower class hotels include free Internet access.
Manager Response: Dear Tina L,  Thank you for staying with us on your visit to Orange County.  We are glad you felt the property gave you a feeling of elegance and comfort.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I booked me & my husband an overnight stay at the Westin for his birthday. We heard the hotel was just renovated and it definitely shows. Our room on the 13th floor was clean, modern, spacious, and had a perfect view of the Segerstrom Hall as well the park in front of the hotel. The staff was friendly, approachable, and courteous. My husband even received a hand-delivered birthday dessert with a hand-written birthday card upon our arrival. The pool was well-kept and had a lot of seating areas including tables for picnics. We thoroughly enjoyed our brief visit here and will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear ipablo1,  We are refreshed by hearing that you felt the personal note on your husbands special day made a difference and that you will be coming back to visit us again.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I'm staying now at the Westin South Coast Plaza with my wife and kids..  The location is really great.. It's across the road from the South Coast Plaza shopping mall, and on Bristol road where there are a lot of places to eat and shop..  The hotel is 20 min away from the Disneyland Park, 15 min to Newport and Laguna beach and about 50 min to Hollywood and Beverly Hills.  The rooms are very clean and specious, and they been renovated recently, and also it has free internet..   But if you rent a car, you need to make sure that you will have to pay 27$ per night for self parking, or 32$ per night for Valet parking.
Manager Response: Dear Loay_1,  Thank you for staying with us and letting us know that you felt your stay was great.  We hope to see you again.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Had the displeasure of recent stay at Westin Costa Mesa. First of all I don't mind paying for a nice hotel as long as the service and attitude of the employees is top notch. At $255 per night it should be, but was not. Lamp stand light in my room did not work. Had a horrible experience with their hotel staff and front office Mgr. named Nick Can't for the life of me understand hoe they could hire and maintain such rude employees and never apologize for sub par behavior. As a business travel have stayed at much nice hotels for much less money with great service. This place clearly missed the mark.
Manager Response: Dear Richard F,  Our sincere apologies that you felt our team missed the mark and we did not rectify your concerns when staying with us. We are dedicated to taking care of our guests.  I apologize that you felt this was not the case.  We hope that we will have another opportunity to make it right for you and re-gain your trust in our hotel.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great service, trendy, water flow horrible
Summary: Great service, always prompt.   However, need to separate SPG gold and platinum line from guests. Staff doesn't follow those rules.   Clean, trendy hotel.   Water pressure and toilet flushing in rooms is horrible. All low flow. They need to fix it.
Manager Response: Dear Nick8545,  Thank you for letting us know how your experience was.  We truly appreciate your feedback. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have frequented this hotel for business meetings, high school reunions and girls "get-away" weekends and it never disappoints.  The location is great (near shopping, Performing Arts Center and CM Fairgrounds) and it has easy access to freeways!  The best part of this hotel is the courtyard with a great waterfall and ample seating.  We also loved the pool on the 2nd floor!  Both areas are pretty unique to a chain hotel and make it stand out from all the other Westin properties.  The food is REALLY good for catering (trust me I am at hotel's monthly for business meetings) and the staff is top notch.  The rooms have been refurbished and have ample seating areas and many outlets (a must when you are sharing a room with 2 other girlfriends).  There are great places to eat at South
Manager Response: Dear JBMBZ,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt our team is top notch and we never disappoint you when with us.  Our team truly appreciates the feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin South Coast is mostly a good choice for shoppers or business folks looking for a central Orange County location.  It's close to the South Coast Plaza shopping center in Costa Mesa (Orange County) and not too far from John Wayne Airport.  I stayed there recently for just one night.  The lobby facilities were attractive and very functional, the customer service was above average (especially the valet car service), and the breakfast was surprisingly fresh and tasty.  But, my room was just okay.  Sure the bed was comfortable and the bathroom was clean with a decent shower, but it was also rather basic; it just wasn't interesting.  Standard big hotel room size and predictability.    Perhaps the biggest plus for the Westin is the location.  It's not only across the street
Manager Response: Dear Craigsworld,  We agree with you completely that "Location Makes a Difference."  Our hotel is centrally located to resort shopping, a variety of restaurants and the arts.  We look forward to having you back with us.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Didn't stay there, but their service is great
Summary: We went to visit family in Costa Mesa, and we were making a photo session for one of my nieces and my daughter, who turned fifteen. We were shooting pictures in formal wear, and passing by the hotel I liked the interior of the lobby and asked the people of the registration counter if they would let us take some pictures inside. They were very happy to let us in and we took some of the best pictures of the group. I thanked them for their hospitality, even though we weren't staying there. A big shout out to the staff.
Manager Response: Dear Jose S., We are glad to hear that your special moment went well when visiting our property. We look forward to having you with us when you can stay overnight.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had to get out of the house for a few days because of a broken water heater, so I cashed in some Starwood points and stayed at this hotel. Upon explaining my situation to the front desk staff, they helped to make my stay a little better by comping my parking, the rollaway bed for my son, and gave us a room upgrade to the executive level and a comer room for no charge.   The room was very large, the bed comfortable, and the room amenities were very good. I was a little disappointed that the bathroom only had a shower and no bathtub (which was a little,inconvenient with my six year old for "bath time"), and the water pressure in the sink was a little lacking, but that was really the only issue I had with the hotel.   There is only one restaurant on the property, and it was
Manager Response: Dear Jsaxm,  Thank you for staying with us on your quick getaway.  Look forward to seeing you again.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed 1 night while traveling.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Although I did not have time to explore it, the outdoor pool area looked very nice and fun.  The on site bar/restaurant looked very nice, but expensive.  I got 1 drink at the bar to end my night, a double Knob Creek on the rocks, $27 !! Free shuttle to John Wayne International Airport was very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear AsMiller429,  Thank you for staying with us during your brief visit. We hope to have you with us for a longer stay that you may enjoy our property more.  Thank you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Westins vary so much on quality and experience and this experience was fantastic.  A beautiful spacious hotel.  I was upgraded to the 15th floor.   My suite was awesome and the lounge and food were just as good.   I held a business meeting in the lobby lounge one day for a full day and it was comfortable and the staff very attentive.   The rooms had robes and were very comfortable. I do wish however that there was an In room coffee maker as I like to get up early and read and have coffee before the day starts without having to get dressed to go to Starbucks but other than that I quite enjoyed everything about this hotel.   I definitely will return and recommend
Manager Response: Dear TerraNovaEx,  Thank you so much for your feedback.  We are glad to hear that you felt your experience with us was fantastic.  We want to let you know we do have coffee makers in our guest rooms.  They have been placed in the cabinet below your TV, but we have moved them recently to the desk for more immediate use.  We hope this helps on your next stay.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many time over the years. I have always found the staff to be friendly and ready to assist.  It had been a while since my last stay, and was extremely pleased to experience the completely renovations.  Tasteful and calming decor that adds to the peacefulness of this hotel.  As this was a business trip, I was thrilled to see the addition of numerous power ports, both to the work area and bedside. As expected, the hotel and my room were spotless. Hallways were so quiet it felt as if I was the only one there.  Easy  access to freeways and all (barring traffic) OC attractions. Shoppers paradise is right across the street. Numerous restaurants in the area.  Looking forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Dear traveling gal,  Thank you so much for letting us know that our recent changes to the guest room meet your business needs.  We are always looking at new ways to accommodate our guests in meaningful ways.  Thank you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Have stayed here several times because I am loyal Starwood and it's convenient. Honestly the room was tired and the not the best considering I am a repeat customer. The staff in the restaurant for breakfast were excellent and they get 5 stars. Hotel was average.
Manager Response: Dear NY Spartan,  We want to be more than average rating for you and our team of dedicated staff will continue to deliver on the high expectations you and all of our valued guests have.  We know that we can show you an experience that will be memorable and have you coming back.  Look forward to the next opportunity we have to deliver on just that.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: When I travel for work I don't have a long list of requirements, but many times they are still not met.  The Westin at South Coast Plaza has been my favorite hotel to stay at for several years and I don't see that changing anytime soon.  Why is this my favorite?  I like a nice hotel, overly fancy or trendy.  I do not need detailed crown molding, sparkling chandeliers or glass door knobs like some grand hotels have.  I also do not need my bed in the middle of the room and club like lighting either.  I most value clean modern rooms that allow me to relax after a long day.  Easy self parking, fast elevators, friendly and attentive staff all compliment the nice facilities.  This property has had a tasteful renovation performed since my last visit and I found it to be very
Manager Response: Dear W. Forster,  We are delighted to hear that you felt our hotel was memorable for you and has only improved since our recent guest room transformation.  We are dedicated to staying your favorite.  Look forward to seeing you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Booked a family getaway weekend at the Westin South Coast Plaza  Hotel was excellent, beautifully remodeled rooms. Front desk staff, wait staff in all the restaurants, Bill staff and concierge were very polite and accommodating.  ***The bad thing that made the trip  not an enjoyment was  the valet service. They damage our car and instead of admitting to it tried to hide it by using the wrong color touch up paint to cover up the scratches they caused.   Mistakes happen that's what insurance is for but trying to covered up and hide it shows the quality and the character of the people they have working in their valet area.  although we thoroughly enjoy the hotel  We sadly will not be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Socalshaver,  Thank you for staying with us.  Our sincere apologies that you enjoyed the hotel but had an unfortunate event that took place. We are dedicated to taking care of our guests and hope that you will give us the opportunity to make right what ever bad experience you may have had.  Please feel free to contact our property should there be something we can do for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had a good 2 night stay. The facilities are very well kept. The rooms newly remodeled and upgraded. Two things to improve: my coffee maker did not work so i called to get a replacement. It took over 30 minutes and two calls to get it delivered. After the secon time that I called, the operator called to follow up asking if my coffee maker was working ok but it had not been deliver yet. The houseman had closed the call before completing it. The second drawback is the overchargedparking fee. $27 for ovrnight parking per day is excessive. Other Westin resorts charge $15 normally. Over all it was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Gus I,  Thank you for sharing your positive feedback about your experience with us and a couple suggestions that we can improve upon.  We truly appreciate any feedback to make our guest experience better. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin South Coast  Plaza is a pleasant  hotel  that  just does everything right.   I stayed here  recently  with  my sister for a 2 nt stay  and found  the Westin staff  provided  outstanding  service  from the moment  we arrived.  Everyone  was extremely  helpful  and  friendly. They certainly  have a "can do" attitude  at this hotel.   The hotel  has  a walkway bridge  attached  to South Coast  Plaza which  makes  it extremely  convenient  if you are a shopper. This is thw nain reason  we decided on this hotel initially.     The plaza  is one of the largest that there is in the Los Angeles  area. There  are several  restaurants  in the Plaza  so that helps  with food options during  mealtimes but we did use  the hotel's  room service  menu and our food arrived  promptly
Manager Response: Dear Bergsoz,  Thank you so much for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We are glad to hear that you felt our location felt new and fresh with our recent transformed guest rooms.  We are looking forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have used the Westin many times over the past 15 years  on business travel to the area.  Its rooms are well equipped, the bed is among the best in any hotel chain, and the fitness center is excellent for aerobic equipment and okay for weights.  Located an easy walk from the South Coast Mall and its range of restaurants and an easy drive to multiple other locations, not to mention John Wayne Airport, the Westin doesn't make you feel as if you are in a white collar prison like those near resorts.    The services in the hotel are adequate, the staff is helpful and friendly.  I will continue to use the Westin whenever I am in the O.C.
Manager Response: Dear Charedm70,  We are glad you enjoyed The Westin Heavenly Bed and that you agree it is the best in the industry.  We have the latest version of the bed so it should be a nice new feel.  Look forward to seeing you on your next stay.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip.  The hotel is newly remodeled so it's very clean and comfortable.  It was in a very central location, next to South Coast Plaza and easy to zip down to the beach that was a few miles away.    The staff was very friendly.  There is a Starbucks in the lobby which has breakfast options that are much cheaper than rooms service.  Somehow a bowl of oatmeal, fresh pressed juice and diet coke cost over $50 for room service when I could've gotten the same thing downstairs for less than $10.. I was traveling with a colleague who was offered the "green option" upon check-in which is an $8.00 voucher to spend at Starbucks or 500 Starwood points in exchange for not cleaning the room every day.  I wasn't offered this option so there was some inconsistency at
Manager Response: Dear TwoTexasTravellers,  Thank you so much for letting us know how you felt when with us.  Our team truly cares about your experience and we appreciate the feedback regarding to Room Service and your guest room.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with great service
Summary: Another great experience at a Westin hotel. The hotel was nice, conveniently located and, as usual for Westin, the service was great. Parking is located across the street and is extra, this was the only minor annoyance on an otherwise great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Lawrence B,  Thank you for your feedback.  When staying at a hotel it is critical that you feel that you have great staff taking care of you.  Glad to hear we delivered. Guest Relations Manager.

Summary: Very nice looking hotel. We got a big room with very comfortable king bed and nice park view. Big and cleaned bathroom too. Max, the front desk person was very nice, kind and professional. He managed to solve the problem of our safe very quickly. He did more than we expected from him. We normally do not like to talk with the hotel staff, but Max was so kind and pleasurable to talk with that we simply could not stop asking him questions. He was very well prepared to answered all our questions and he recommended us a lot of nice and interesting places around the hotel. Thank you Max!
Manager Response: Dear LSpika,  Thank you for letting us know that Max made all the difference for your stay.  We will make sure Max knows that he delivered for you and made you feel comfortable.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times and you can't beat the location.  Right across the street from South Coast Plaza and easily close to Irvine, Anaheim, even Newport Beach.  All the rooms have recently been renovated since this past december.  The staff was very courteous and nice and went out of their way to make sure my family and I had a pleasant stay.  The rooms are clean and spacious, the beds comfortable.  They took out the mini bar and snacks so you actually get a small fridge to use.  There is a starbucks downstairs and the Pinot restaurant in the lobby was more than fine for breakfast.  Overall, it was great for its location and price
Manager Response: Dear Eddy L,  Thank you for your valued feedback.  Glad to know that you had a pleasant stay due to how our team delivered on your experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Complete business and conferencing destination under construction in front
Summary: At the entrance, step carefully-it's being re done for low water, most likely. Our medical group obtained drinks, chat areas, and the catering service was prompt with each meal service. I do note they cleaned up the service within seconds of the attendees going back into session, so if you came back out to get more coffee...sorry about that, it was gone. In Seconds: gone. Their rooms were well appointed & the mattress comfortable enough. I applaud the hotel for enforcing noise levels for guests, as some people like to play loud music.  No smoking is visibly posted on the landings, a good thing. The business center computer was snappy-in the evenings you need to go to the desk, get the e-mail of the clerk, and have them print any items you might need. Weekenders can ask about
Manager Response: Dear bugnurse56,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy to hear that you felt the hotel was a great experience for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Destination Wedding Group
Summary: We are from the upper midwest and my son and his bride had a destination wedding in Laguna Beach on the ocean.  This was a great hotel for all the out of towners to fly into and get a free shuttle to the hotel.  The group rate I got was fantastic - much closer to $100/nt than $200.  The property is typical Westin,  First class, great lobby, very nice bar, very comfortable and contemporary rooms.  Very classy.  The pool area had cabanas and they also had a contemporary waterfall you could see from inside the hotel.  Everyone commented on what a terrific value this was and how first class it was.  And there were over 40 of us.  The staff was typical Westin - right there when ever you needed them.   The property is a short walk to the huge shopping/restaurant plaza next door which
Manager Response: Dear EstebanMinneapolis,  We are so delighted we could be your destination for your special occasion.  It is great to hear that you felt that our team was prompt in delivering on what your needs were during your special visit.  We hope to be your choice each time you need a memorable experience at a hotel in Orange County.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Location is great, food is very average at best. Wasn't impressed with room service. Friendly staff, valet guys were nice although on a few occasions left standing around waiting for people to help us. Service is not over which I'm used to at Fairmonts. Had to stay here this trip, next trip it's back to the Fairmont down the street.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin E,  Thank you for informing us of your experience.  My sincere apologies that we did not deliver on our usual excellent service.  We have taken your feedback and shared it with our team so we may continue to strive for memorable service experiences.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great, well managed Westin. Rooms are modern, spacious and clean. Staff are helpful and friendly. There is a fee for parking but there are options for self-park at lower rate than valet and parking is located very close by. A mall is within walking distance and there are good food options in a general 5 mile radius of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear LostSojourner,  It is truly nice to have comforts at a hotel that are convenient.  We are glad that your needs were met when you stayed with us.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: This property is very lucky they are the only Starwood property in the area.
Summary: I have stayed at this property with my husband many times. It is clean, recently renovated and they have a great location.  However the front desk staff has a cold and indifferent attitude towards their guests.
Manager Response: Dear Judi G,  Thank you for letting us know how you feel our team delivers service.  We are dedicated to providing service that is memorable and allows our guest to be at their best.  My sincere apologies you did not feel this way when with us.  Thank you for your feedback.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The earlier reviewer who called this a "textbook Westin" is right. By that I mean that the hotel is perfectly fine for a night's stay: clean, recently renovated (new carpet, new bathrooms, crown moulding), quiet enough to get some sleep. But it is very Westin in that there's nothing particularly great, charming, or comfortable about it: your job here is to sleep and get on your way. The parking is really expensive ($27). Staff was serviceable but there was no Platinum recognition.
Manager Response: Dear Veronica S,  Thank you so much for your valued feedback.  We truly appreciate your loyalty as a Starwood Platinum member.  Our team is dedicated to ensuring our Starwood members feel recognized.  We will make sure our team continues those efforts.  Thank you for lettting us know.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel meets all the Westin standards. Good sized rooms and amazing bed. Nice views and room service was fresh and delicious. Staff were friendly and helpful.  Easy walk to huge shopping malls.  Close to local airport and about 40 minutes from lax.  Will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Hunter S,  It is great to hear that you felt the hotel hit the target on the Westin experience.  The shopping convenience is key and is what draws most of our guest to our location.  We look forward to having you with us on your next stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a family stay and shopping in Orange County
Summary: We stayed here to do some after Christmas shopping and thought the hotel and the location were perfect for our family.  The hotel is a short walk away from the mall and there was none of the typical parking hassle.  The front desk was very friendly, and the room was nice and spacious.  We will stay here again when we go back to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Mnasf,  Thank you for staying with us.  Good to hear you felt the experience was hassle free.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Decent Westin, But Not My Favorite
Summary: I stay here from time to time because I'm an SPG Platinum member and it the closest Starwood property to Newport Beach area.   The staff is great and the rooms are fine; typical Westin, but not once in 5 years have I been offered an upgrade. Additionally, as a business traveler, I appreciate a club lounge. Granted the lounges are more a Sheraton thing, but I'm finding more and more Westin's offering them...just not this one.   Starwood can certainly use some better presence in South OC, but until then, the Westin South Coast will do. Nothing fantastic, nothing outstanding, just textbook Westin.
Manager Response: Dear ProsperFam,  Thank you for letting us know that you feel our staff is great.  We truly appreciate your feedback regarding to the option of a lounge.  We hope to see you on your next visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean rooms, convenient location, Starwood quality hospitality.
Summary: I love this hotel.  I have stayed at least a half dozen times.  The restaurant there, Pinot Provence, is very, very good.  If you want something different, South Coast Plaza is right across the street with many other culinary choices.  It is close to SNA [John Wayne Airport], and a stone's throw away from the 405 freeway.  There's lots of pretty landscaped grounds surrounding the Westin and the Performing Arts Center is right next door...Don't hesitate to stay here if you have a chance.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn H,  Our Housekeeping team takes pride in our guest rooms and it is great to hear that you felt that they delivered on your expectations.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I love this hotel! The location is amazing: steps to the Segerstrom Performing Arts Center, South Coast Plaza, and a quick ride to John Wayne. My one complaint previously was the dated/boring rooms, but they are in the middle of updating the rooms, so it's basically perfect now! The valet service is so friendly and helpful, as are the bellhops. Check in is a breeze (although it can get backed up on Saturday if there is a wedding at the hotel), and Max in particular shines. My Starwood ambassador usually calls ahead with my room preferences, and they are always noted and accommodated if at all possible, which I appreciate.  Rooms are a good size and the new ones are beautifully done. Views are pretty cool, too, overlooking so much of OC. One story in particular explains why I am
Manager Response: Dear Erin555,  Thank you for your valued feedback.  It appears you are loyal to Westin and your experience at our property made you feel special.  We will make sure to share this with our team.  Thank you for staying with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We went there for a wedding on October 2010. (It did not give me an option to pick that date). Everywhere in this hotel was clean and well maintained. The staff were super friendly and their service was outstanding. I remember my graduation was coming up and I had to provide them my head's dimension !!! for graduation ceremony outfit. I asked front desk for measuring tape and they called their utility guy who was working at the roof to come downstairs and gave his tape to us!!  The location is excellent since it's close to the mall. The Gym was great and well maintained.
Manager Response: Dear K G,  Thank you for sharing that you feel that our staff is caring.  The team truly appreciates the feedback.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Westin SCP 3 times now. It is a large and luxurious hotel and I have always enjoyed my stay there. It is just across a footbridge from the enormous South Coast Plaza which is the purpose of my trip so cannot be beaten for convenience.  The rooms are large with good sized bathrooms.  This trip when I was there they were doing rennovations and even though they were on another floor they could still be heard working from the room I was in.  The pool area is nice but very basic but the lobby lounge is a really nice place if you just want a light meal and a nice glass of wine. There is also a French restaraunt in the hotel which is amazing.  My only real issue with my stay at SCP is that there is not free WIFI in the rooms. After staying at 7 hotels during this
Manager Response: Dear Shannon G,  It is nice to know that you felt the hotel was convenient for you.  It is important to feel comfortable when traveling.    Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin is located right by a performing arts center and across the street from the mall. Newport beach is a close drive as long as you don't hit to much traffic. It took us less than 20 minutes. The hotel itself is beautiful and the staff is very attentive. They had great suggestions about sights to see and places to visit. My only critique would be about the view. Great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jinbean732,  It is fabulous that you felt the team was attentative during your stay.  Hope to have you with us next time.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Westin South Coast Plaza for a training event, and was immediately impressed by the service when I checked in late on a Saturday night. I was given a room - small, but very comfortable - on a floor that had recently been renovated. The view from the room was very nice; I could even see the fireworks from Disneyland.  The morning dining options were limited; the hotel restaurant isn't cheap, but you can get some basics from the Starbucks in the lobby. I also visited the hotel gym, which isn't large, but is very clean and well-equipped. It's situated right next to the heated pool, which looked very inviting (especially after traveling from the snow-covered east coast).  The rest of my stay was pleasant. I ordered dinner from room service one night, and although
Manager Response: Dear Richard R,  It is wonderful to hear that we were able to impress you.  The convenience of the hotel met all your needs.  We look forward to having you again.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: One of the nicest hotels I've booked in recent years. It's sleek without being too modern, and set in a lovely parkland setting that includes a grassy plaza close to a major Orange County arts center and a large mall. The views from rooms on the top floors are fantastic - you can see most of the LA basin.  Our room was spacious and immaculate, and the Westin beds are wonderful. The elevators were speedy, and the lobby deserves a bow: there is a large sitting area near the bar that looks out onto a covered patio with a large water feature - a waterfall spread over a long ledge that sparkles in the sun. There's a touch of zen without being presumptuous.  We walked around the plaza and over the nearby pedestrian bridge to the swanky South Coast mall. It's a busy area - and finding
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey M,  Thank you for staying with us.  It is great to hear that you felt your experience was great and the setting was beautiful.  We look forward to your return visit on your travels.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I had a great time staying at The Westin in Costa Mesa. It provided an extremely comfortable stay (with great staff!) while we were in California and was a great base for our trips to the surrounding areas- we were sure to hit Laguna Niguel (to visit friends- a bit farther off), Huntington Beach and Newport Beach and were originally worried about the proximity yet we chose The Westin because it was a cost less than some of the other hotels we were considering. We are so glad we did! The only downside was the cost of parking per day‚Ä¶if memory serves me correctly it was around $24 for self-parking and you were charged per. day. While being charged per. day is understandable (and the norm) it was a bit irritating that we had to pay for a full day although we didn't
Manager Response: Dear Kayli,  We are glad to hear that you had a comfortable stay and felt the team did a great job.  Hope to see you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Just what you'd expect from a Westin. Efficient friendly staff.
Summary: This hotel is presently undergoing renovation, currently on the upper floors. We stayed on the sixth floor and all was peaceful and quiet. Great location adjacent to the Orange County Performing Arts complex and just a short walk over a pedestrian bridge to get to the South Coast Plaza. Internet is free is you book on line and are a SPG member.  Just one caveat, if you're a wine drinker expect to pay upwards of $14 per glass. Go to Trader Joe,s or a wine store. If they were pouring exceptional wines i could see but??  We'll be back and bring out own wine this time. Enjoy this facility.
Manager Response: Dear LVSCA,  Thank you for letting us know that you had a peaceful and quiet visit.  We strive to ensure our transformation does not impact our guest.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was a wonderful hotel.  The staff was courteous, helpful and friendly. The pool area was pretty with comfortable chairs, and the food in the restaurant was better quality than typically seen in hotels. Across the street is a state of the art shopping mall, South Coast Plaza, that was bigger than any I've ever seen.   We loved our stay and will be back.
Manager Response: Dear ShirleygFoxb,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt the staff was courteous, friendly and helpful.  Our team is dedicated to taking care of our valued guests.  Looking forward to having you with us on your next stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My daughter already reviewed the great service we had with A.J. in making our weekend reservation. So, now we would like to add this addendum: A.J. had assisted my daughter in arranging to have two adjoining rooms so we could be close and comfortable without spending a fortune on a suite. My daughter had mentioned to A.J. that we were having a mother daughter weekend to bond after an emotionally difficult year. Well, when we arrived there was a beautiful platter of gourmet cheese, crackers and all sorts of other goodies...but it was the note that bowled us over! A.J. wrote a note on behalf of him and the staff that was so lovely and thoughtful! It absolutely started our weekend on an excellent note. We were both so giddy with this sweet surprise. So, to A.J. we send a heartfelt
Manager Response: Dear Rita W,  Thank you so much for letting us know that AJ made an impact on your stay.  Our team is dedicated to delivering memorable experiences and it looks like AJ did just that for you. We will make sure he is recognized. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel! Nice facility, Friendly Staff, Close to Shopping and Dining!
Summary: From the Valet, to the Front Desk Staff it was a perfect experience. Quick check-in process, clean, bright, open hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The pool was nice and relaxing, beds were comfortable, rainfall shower was a nice way to start our day. Would definitely stay here again next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Nikki C,  Thank you so much for your feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed at Westin South Coast many times and through the years, the hotel has excelled it‚Äôs service to stellar heights. Perfectly situated across from the South Coast Plaza shopping mecca and just off the freeway and it is just minutes from John Wayne airport makes the location ideal.  I have also stayed at the Marriott down the street and will provide a review, but this property is preferred. Since I‚Äôve stayed many times, I have formed a relationship with the front desk staff and call before for Starwood Platinum upgrade. Also, very helpful at the front desk is Theresa
