Summary: As I was headed for the lobby, the bell boy spotted me and stepped up to open the door. Inside another staff member guided me to the meeting room.  The meeting room was ok.  Some day the hotel will realize that they need to get better chairs for long meetings! I asked one of the waiters for a towel to roll up and put behind my back, and he brought me four napkins!  Really!  Too hard to find a towel in a hotel! The other disappointing part was the lukewarm coffee from first thing in the morning!    After the meeting when I was hanging around in the lobby, the bar tender very pleasantly came over to ask if I would like a glass of water. The lobby was smart with a beautiful waterfall to look at.    It is a great location with a footbridge to the Mall and a number of other
Manager Response: Dear SKG109,  Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I am motivated to write this review before I have even gone to the hotel because I received such excellent service from the reservation assistant, A.J. Without boring anyone with the details I had a sensitive situation of spending a weekend with a family member but being concerned that sharing the same room might be difficult. A.J. set it up so we reserved two rooms that were adjoining and with an affordable rate. He was sensitive, good humored and understanding as I explained the situation. Thank you, A.J.
Manager Response: Dear Alisa, W,  Thank you so much for your great comments regarding one of our employees.  It truly makes all the difference to our team to know that they made an impact on a guest stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Much needed reno in progress - but where?
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while giving a talk for a local health organization. The hotel is in a prime location - linked to the swanky South Coast Plaza shopping centre. There are big signs in the hotel about a renovation underway - but no signs of it in my room. This is a cookie-cutter Westin - but it is so tired.... cracks in the tiles around the bath and in the sink - and why do we still have those dreadful shower in bath tubs in 2015? We need walk-in showers, please! At 4:30 on my full day there my room had still not been made up - I needed to nap so did not call about this - but I was out all day and they have plenty of time for a quick whip around and towel replacement. As a SPG gold member I am also annoyed about the lack of consistency in amenities provided - this time no
Manager Response: Dear Travellingnur,  Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to you experiencing our transformed property on your next visit.  We apologize for your experience on your last visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Westin's never disappoint. This was no different. Forget that you walk in and smell the white tea signature fragrance as the air hits your nostrils... I love that smell. The front desk staff greeted me quickly and was friendly. The hotel and rooms were clean and spacious.  The hotel is a walkway away from the high end Costa Mesa mall and airport. which is a bonus. Definite recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Zelina N,  We are glad that you felt the sensory experience upon arriving to our Westin.  We look forward to your return to our prime location.  Guest Relations Manager

Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have had the opportunity to stay at the Westin in Costa Mesa probably 15 times and it is always a great experience. The staff is friendly and accommodating, the rooms are clean and atmosphere overall is perfect. The location of the Westin is also a major plus with many 5 star restaurants nearby, plus a large mall across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Tyler L,  Thank you for staying with us.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the area.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My visit included two stays on different days. The first one I had a room at the end of the corridor. The Hotel is arranged so that there is a stairway on the outside of the Hotel. Around 2:00 am a person collecting dishes and glass ware dropped the entire cart. what a tremendous noise this made, it woke up everyone on that floor. The room was quite, but was in really bad shape. Manager Response: Dear Michael M,  We value your feedback and your loyalty to Starwood as a Lifetime Platinum.  Our sincere apologies that this was your experience. Summary: We took friends to see Kinky Boots. They arrived early and shopped at South Coast Plaza.  We had a nice dinner at the hotel and a short and sweet walk to the theater. Manager Response: Dear Karen L,  Our location is a great destination to stay when coming to see the arts at the local venues.  Glad to hear that it met all your needs.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great location for work and shopping.  Right across from the South Coast mall and wonderful restaurants.  The hotel is going through renovation which it really needs. I expect that the next time I stay here the rooms will be at the level one would expect of a Westin property.
Manager Response: Dear C0Travelr1,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  It is refreshing to hear that you feel our location is great!  Look forward to your next stay with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel because it was the site of a conference. It was adequate for these purposes: clean, well-staffed, easy to reach. I arrived at 10 am and was given a room immediately; I was checked in by a delightful woman called Vicky. The room was fine and comfortable but decor rather dated -- think ugly beige wallpaper, cheap bathroom fixtures, etc. But the bed was soft and hotel quiet so I had a good night's rest before leaving earl he next morning. I wouldn't seek out this hotel but if you have to visit the immediate area it is sufficient for business travelers.
Manager Response: Dear NYinTransit,  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to provide you with the type of service you deserve.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed one night a couple days ago. Everything was great. Check in process was smooth and welcoming. Room was very clean and spacious. Sally at the front desk was super kind and very efficient. We would love to return this hotel next time.
Manager Response: Dear Euno312,  Thank you for staying with us.  Good to hear everything was great for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We arrived at the hotel absolutely exhausted on Christmas Day. The front desk receptionist Max was very helpful and gave us a room with a Christmas tree view. They also have Starbucks coffee and Turbinado cane sugar which is a definite plus for me since many hotels don't have this sugar in the rooms and I usually bring my own.  Overall an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ange331,  We are glad to hear that you felt your holiday was a memorable one with us.  We look forward to your return.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin South Coast Plaza, Costa Mesa  is a nice hotel that lives up to its star rating, though, in my opinion it is a notch below its competition in this category. The hotel, located just off the 405 freeway and across the street from South Coast Plaza, has a canopied entrance to a large lobby with a lot of activity.  Because there is no on-site parking (later),  there are many valet‚Äôs and bellman at the front.  I was checked in efficiently and given the room type of my request. The rooms are very large, well appointed, with a long working surface, big flat-screen TV with lots of channels, and a side chair and ottoman.   The closet was small but had an iron, hair dryer, safe and all of the accouterments you would want.  I had two comfortable double beds with lots of pillows

Summary: This property is perfect in many ways.  It is conveniently connected to the South Coast Plaza Shopping Center with a sky bridge.  It shares grounds with the community theater as well as being within walking distance of many fine restaurants.  The rooms are large and comfortable.  We have stayed many times but this trip we were reminded of how valuable quality staff can be.  As I checked in, I mentioned to the clerk (who happened to be the hospitality manager) that my husband was not feeling well, had caught a cold.  She promptly gave us a room away from the elevators but not too far down the hall.  We had a lovely view of an enormous Christmas tree.  Then a few hours later we answered the door to a tray with hot tea, soup and a glass of orange juice.  It was accompanied by a
Manager Response: Dear Carol H,  We are glad to hear that our Manager was able to give some extra attention while you were not at your best when with us. We look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We love staying at this property for over 15 years always a favorite and great loaction. While there go to Masto's. Staff is great home away from home! Parking can be a bit of a pain, use valet and call early!
Manager Response: Dear Paul S,  Thank you for staying with us and letting us know that your needs are met when with us.  We look forward to your return.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I booked two rooms for a few days and from the moment we stepped into the lobby Miriam at the desk was incredible. She made us feel welcomed, she was very patient and helpful. Since we were traveling from Phoenix we were tired and ordered IRD, Nick was a lively person to speak with especially when trying to order our food after a 6 hour drive. Soon after Pedro arrived  to deliver our food he was a kind man. Everyone we encounter on property was polite and amazing;  the staff played a grand part in why we had such a great stay! Thank you again!   Also its an ideal location from the Mall across the street and it was about 20mins from Disneyland Resort.
Manager Response: Dear ambegue,  We are delighted that you stayed with us and had a remarkable stay.  We will make sure that Pedro and Nick are recognized for delivering a memorable stay for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We loved this hotel. It has great location off the freeways, near major businesses and restaurants, and a walking distance from a HUGE mall. We particularly enjoyed the swimming pool. It's hard to find a 10 ft. pool in hotels anymore; it was heated and very clean. Cross from the pool, there is a nice gym. The rooms are nice and well equipped. The staff is friendly and helpful. I liked the water fall, and the overall ambiance of the hotel. Definitely I will revisit again soon.  On the downside: 1- Parking is SUPER expensive. If you can walk a block or two, park at the mall. 2- Cleaning of the pool area with a pressure washer should be done before the pool area opens. We were swimming around 10 AM while the cleaning took place. Not very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Bashar Z,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are refreshed to hear that you felt your experience was above and beyond.  We appreciate the feedback.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Excellent sleep during two night stay, very comfy bed, pillows and sheets. Good room service and restaurant. Great staff. But needs updated wiring to be device friendly. Our room was full of extension cords and No plugs at table height.
Manager Response: Dear babette50,  Thank you for your comments.  We are exciting to be transforming our property starting this year and into 2015.  We hope you get an opportunity to see it.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Very Good Location Allows You Easy Access to the Huge Mall and the Performing Arts
Summary: It's a Westin. Well-kept, friendly service, and higher rates than you would expect. The restaurants are expensive as is the Lobby Bar. That is all to be expected at a Westin. However, I didn't give it five stars for two reasons. First of all, our room was too warm and we couldn't get it cooler. The thermostats are fixed so you can't cool it down to one's liking. My second complaint is the real reason that I was not happy with our stay. They still charge for internet in your room. This review cost me $12 because I am still in my room. For crying out loud, Hampton Inn, Day's Inn and Motel 6 give you free Internet with their $60 to $90 room rate! For the money one spends to stay at a  quality hotel, they need to loosen up a bit and get with it. Charging for wifi is just another way
Manager Response: Dear Casaflamingo,  It is nice to have a hotel in a great location and have all your needs met.  Good to hear that you felt our team delivered a friendly experience for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is an expensive hotel so expectations are high.  The staff was very nice, the room was clean, and the overall facility is fine.  The hotel is very close to the airport and walking distance to the shopping mall.  All good things.  But.....  While everything was nice, it was not up to the price.  The room was nice but not great.  Size was OK but not huge.  Workout room was nice with lots of running machines.  Pool was nice.  Conference rooms were OK.  As a Starwood preferred guest, we got ONE (yes just one) free bottle of water.  Wow.  I expected much more.  One of the most irritating things was internet connection cost $11.95 a day for slower speeds, $14.95 for high speed.  When I pay over $300 a night, paying for internet is just robbery.  I have stayed at a lot of hotels
Manager Response: Dear BWlandBeyond,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your stay.  It is nice to hear that you felt the experience overall was pleasant.  We take your feedback serious and take pride in delivering on memorable stays for our guests.  We will continue to lead our team to deliver on that promise. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Easy to get to. Pet friendly.  Came here at the recommendation of groom for wedding. Hotel staff was friendly and accommodated us.  Heard there is great shopping nearby.  Good parking and no fees for going in and out.  Reasonable daily rate.
Manager Response: Dear Esther A,  Thank you for your feedback.  We hope to see you on your next visit to Cosa Mesa.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have previously stayed at this Westin so this was a return visit after an 18 months break. This is an excellent hotel to stay at. We received exceptional customer service from the front desk, the porters, housekeeping and the concierge printed off maps and gave us clear directions to our destinations.  The rooms are looking a ittle tired relative to the other hotels in the chain but the rooms are very clean and the beds are some of the most comfortable hotel beds I have ever slept in.  We will definately be returning to enjoy the hospitality that the Westin South Coast Plaza offers.
Manager Response: Dear Emma P,  Thank you for staying with us.  We truly appreciate your feedback and we are excited to hear that you felt the staff was exceptional.  We look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel fronts a bridge that connects directly to the South Coast Plaza mall, which was very convenient. The fitness center was clean and very busy in the morning. business center and hotel cafe for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear MililaniChica,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that our location was convenient for you and it mets your needs.  Hope to have you back on your return to the area. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We typically get to the Westin in Costa Mesa once or twice a year. It is always great. We ordered room service late Saturday night after returning from a fundraising event nearby. When the chips came without salsa, the server gladly insisted on going and getting it for us, which she did. We also screwed up the code on the safe lock and needed help getting it open. A staff member arrived very promptly. I love the rainfall shower, much better than the two-headed shower they used to have.
Manager Response: Dear ujeeber1977,  It is a pleasure to read your comments regarding to the consistent terrific experience you have with us.  We look forward to serving you on your next stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Arrived on Friday the 26th of September for a Girlfriend getaway and wanted to stay near the South Coast Plaza for the great shopping and Restaurants! The Westin was accross the street and thought that it would be a perfect fit!! Pulled in at Valet! The Valet was very nice as was the bellman. We entered the hallway of the floor we were on (9th) and found plastic and blowers going off in the rooms across from ours. The Carpet was rippled and dirty all along the hallway. Thinking they had flooding in the rooms across the hall we gave the hotel a break. We entered our room and found it to be a disappointment. The room looked tired and dirty. The chair was full of stains and the wood furniture was old and beat up and  The sink was cracked  as well. The refrigerator didn't work so
Manager Response: Dear Zzbbyy,  Thank you for your feedback.  We take your concerns very serious and will continue to work hard to address them to ensure a seamless experience for all of our guests.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location but noted some concerns
Summary: Shopping weekend for 4 ladies. We have high expectations being that all of us are in customer service industries.  The valet folks, front desk and Doug were very helpful.  The condition of our room was not acceptable.  The chair was dirty and things just seemed a bit shabby and not what we have come to expect for a Westin. The carpet in the hall was frayed.  The two rooms across from us had plastic and tape on the floor outside the doors. Obviously some kind of water damage as fans were running.  We had a drink in Provence and the bar tender presented us with a cheese tray that he said was complimentary. Yet, when the bill came, the cost was included in our bill. We caught it and he did remove it.  I'm sorry to say the hotel, in an excellent location, is a bit run down.
Manager Response: Dear Suzchad,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your visit.  We are excited to inform you that we are expecting a room transformation coming late this year that will enhance our guest experience.  We hope you will give our hotel another opportunity when coming to the area.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Having stayed at this location on several occasions, the customer care and convenience of location are tough to beat.  Admittedly, I have been fortunate to receive very affordable rates, thus my stays have always been a good value.  The cost of the valet is tough to swallow but restaurants and entertainment are within walking distance.  Minutes away from John Wayne (SNA) airport without the 7am, Boeing 737 wake up call is nice too.  Don't be afraid to give this Westin a chance- especially if visiting over the holidays.
Manager Response: Dear M2A3L,  Thank you for making The Westin South Coast Plaza your hotel of choice when in the Orange County area.  Look forward to you staying with us again. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: All staff that I came in contact with were attentive and pleasant. I was excited to go to the Brasserie as I love the one inside the Venetian in Las Vegas. It turned out we were only able to have breakfast there and the service was top notch and the food tasty. Even though this hotel is pet friendly, you wouldn't know it, the rooms were impeccable and free of odor.
Manager Response: Dear 2hope,  Thank you for staying with us while in Orange County.  We truly care about our guest experiences.  We are refreshed to hear that it was a great stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Service is top-notch, staff was extremely accommodating
Summary: With my husband and I's anniversary and also an important job interview for my husband, we decide to rent a hotel in the area so he wouldn't have to battle traffic to get there.  We thought it would be the perfect time to celebrate our 4 year anniversary as well, which ended up being the same date as his interview. I found Westin South coast plaza online, I have always been a fan of the Westin hotels resorts and have previously stayed at the Westin Kaanapali Maui, Westin Mission Hills Rancho Mirage, and Westin NYC. I have always experienced the best and nothing less. My experience so far at the Westin South Coast Plaza has been so nice. Valet was polite, informative and very helpful. Nadine at the reservations desk went out of her way to welcome us. She upgraded us to a deluxe

Summary Heading: Great service, classy hotel, and friendly, but ...

Friendliness and service was top-notch.  If you like shopping at shops typically associated with "money" and has a Beverly Hills / Bellagio Hotel Casino feel to it, then the South Coast Mall, which is across the pedestrian bridge, is the place for you.  The shopping center is anchored by Nordstroms, Saks, Macy's, and Sears (how'd they sneak in there?).  Scattered within the shopping center is Gucci, Tiffany's, Apple, Sony, Microsoft, and a number of stores with Italian names.  Most had price tags above my level of comprehension.  There are a number of shopping alternatives in the area as
Manager Response: Dear Johnny F,  Thank you for sharing with us your experience, Our staff works hard to deliver meaningful interactions with our valued guests.  Glad to hear you felt that they were very friendly.  Thank you for your feedback regarding to our pricing.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel  great service, close to the South Coast mall.
Summary: Top quality hotel and services.  We arrived early in the afternoon and the room was ready.  We were upgraded in a SPG members room and we had access to the lounge for breakfast.  Close to the mall. Easy drive from the beach.  We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear R Cote,  Top notch is exactly what our guest expect and deserve.  We are happy to hear that you felt you received what your expectations were when with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: From the moment you pull up to the front door you are greeted by most friendly, helpful, and professionally mannered staff and it continues throughout your entire stay. Busy as it was when any member of the staff interacted with me it was as if I were the only guest in the hotel. Impressively in synch and clearly enjoying where they worked and what they do. Upon entering you are greeted by a spectacular floral arrangement and their wonderful natural fragrance to immediately imparting a sense of calm and beauty. Behind that the amazing waterfall and garden providing a backdrop for the classy lobby bar. The physical property is impeccably maintained and the rooms are huge and comfortable with great seating to kick back in whether to catch up on work or just relax and watch some
Manager Response: Dear RRGainey1,  We appreciate your feedback.  It is delightful to hear that you felt that the hotel staff made it memorable for you in many ways.  We look forward to your return visit with us. Guest Relations Manaager

Summary Heading: The Westin South Coast Plaza wants all of your money...all of it...
Summary: I've stayed at dozens of four and five star hotels across North America.  The Westin is the worst four star "island"  hotel.  An "island" hotel is property that can charge you as much as they feel comfortable with because you're never leaving the "island."   The Westin South Coast Plaza is committed to taking as much money as they can from their guests.  They take advantage of the absence of public parking and being isolated from walkable restaurants once the mall is closed.  From wifi, to food, to parking the prices they charge push the very limit of greed and callousness. For example, $18.50 for a continental breakfast, $11.95 a day for wifi, and parking at $24.00 per night for parking (the lot was totally empty) makes you almost angry enough to leave...almost. I also didn't
Manager Response: Dear 5ChristopherD,  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We truly care about how you feel we deliver the guest experience.  We hope we get another opportunity to have you stay with us so we may deliver on your expectations.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Above and beyond....  Our recent five-night stay was hotel and service perfection. The room was comfortable, tasteful, and our preferences and special requests were honored warmly and promptly. Ms. Chu, a gracious professional manager, went out of her way to provide a special birthday surprise for my husband as well as to accommodate his special needs for bright light. The entire staff was friendly, quick to respond, and eager to assist. This hotel continues to maintain high standards, attractive ambiance, and the kind of service that makes us want to return. We highly praise and recommend the Westin South Coast Plaze. The surrounding area is classy and has something for everyone.
Manager Response: Dear 2lovetogo2,  Thank you for letting us know that Joyce, our manager on duty, went above and beyond for your experience and it made an impression on your experience.  We do embrace green practices at our property and with Starwood to sustain and reduce the impact on the climate and environment.  We look forward to your return visit with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in the Heart of Shopping District
Summary: The Westin @ South Coast Plaza is a BEAUTIFUL Hotel located @ the  55 & 405 freeways in Costa Mesa latterly right across the street from South Coast Plaza.  The hotel room in which I stayed in had a stale air like of a smoker. (IM assuming someone broke the rules as it is a 100% smoke free hotel) The Bed was heavenly and soooooo comfortable.  There is a mini fridge but empty... (Sadness)   and the kicker is you have to PAY FOR WIFI...  a Major hotel like this needs to have something free!  Parking is a separate fee.   Just include EVERYTHING into the one price!   Employees at front desk were professional and helpful.  There was a little snackbar/coffee shop next to the front desk.   Pool was heated and pool grounds were nice!   If I was in the aread again, I would have no
Manager Response: Dear JoPeSh3,  Thank you for letting us know that our front office staff was helpful.  We value you as a guest of Westin and look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Best stay at Westin South Coast !
Summary: Love my Westin South Coast and this stay was the best yet. Nana and Theresa took care of me and as a Platinum SPG member, I was upgrade to a luxury one bedroom suite...so cool. 1620/1622 Parkside Suite is near the elevators. Other suites include the corner unit 1609/1610 California Suite and 1628/1629.   The hotel is close to SNA airport and across the street from South Coast Plaza (large upscale shopping mall, known as heaven) and adjacent to the Segerstrom Center for the Arts. It is just off the freeway and very convenient location. The hotel has many large ballrooms where events and wedding are held. There is a nice pool and Fitness Center.  As you walk in, the Lobby Bar is situated right there, with the water feature just pass outside and the bar menu has appetizers,
Manager Response: Dear SusieJue,   Thank you for giving us your valued feedback regarding your experience at the hotel.  It is great to know that you felt our team was friendly and that you look forward to returning.

Summary: One of the best of hotels in Costa Mesa and really busy in the morning. Being right across a mall is a nice added bonus and they have a great theater and small walking park. With minutes away from the airport, this is my favorite hotel spot.
Manager Response: Dear Tony N,  We are excited to be your favorite hotel of choice.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great service, weak food
Summary: I travel for work and stay here every week. Most of the front desk reps even recognize me when I check in every monday. For the most part, I don't ask much of them. I go to work in the morning, work out in the evening, go to sleep at night. The room is always made up to perfection every day. I once had to stay here over a 2 week period and asked if there was another method of laundry service to avoid what would be a $250 laundry bill using their out-of-house service. They graciously offered to use the housekeeping facilities to wash my clothes. I'm sure that's an exception but one that went far in my book.  They only lose a star on the food and drink aspects. I expect to pay a premium for both but their entrees tend to be bland, boring, and somewhat meager portions. Their mixed
Manager Response: Dear Kevin C,  Thank you for letting us know that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate the feedback regarding to our in-room dining and lobby lounge.  We take your feedback very serious and truly care about what your personal preference is so we can continue to improve. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Westin is a great brand; it's even better overseas.  My first time at this location was a delight.  Greeted with a warm smile upon check in (sadly this is a lost art these days).  The front desk was empathetic to my needs and introduced me to the bellman.  Convenient location to 405 Fwy and across the street from perhaps the best shopping mall in the country.  Ill be back.
Manager Response: Dear Esqtodd,  Thank you for providing us feedback that our team welcomed you with empathy.  It is very important to us that our team delivers the experience that helps you feel at your best.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Check In -Was looking for Clues to connect
Summary: I arrived lat on a Friday night greated by the young front desk associate.  I had asked where the nearest CVS was and shee asked what was I looking to purchase.  When I stated cold medication she came from the back with several samples for me to choose from.  The expereince did not end there.  She closed the experience out by asking if I would liket some soup and crackers sent to the room.  Very good example of reading my needs. Hotel was clean.... long lings at Starbucks.  Really like the complimentary self-park across the street.  great visit!!!
Manager Response: Dear msneen,  It is great that our front office staff was able to assist with your experience when you came.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was a coordinator for an event held at the westin south coast plaza.  The event was for approximately 100 people, a 20 year class reunion.  The banquet room was set up on time and even early.  I asked the captain, Jose Ornelas, for another table. He quickly set it up, no questions asked.  In fact, whatever I needed, the wait staff, under the direction of Jose, took care of it. Our event was a buffet dinner, which was quite tasty.  It included lots of fresh vegetables and other healthy choices.  The wait staff are very well trained, prompt and courteous. Jose appears low key but clearly is in control.
Manager Response: Dear janeyjans,  Thank you for choosing our property for your meeting.  It is great to hear that Jose from our Banquet team made all the difference. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Spent four days here for business.  All of the meetings were held on property.  Very nice rooms and overall very clean.  Great place for business meetings.  You can use your own rental car or the transit system which is a close walk.  Also very close to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Mark G,  Thank you for coming to our hotel for your business needs.  We are glad to hear that your meeting experience met your expectations.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff was exceptional, as was the service. We ordered room service after 11pm, it arrived quickly and steaming, it wasn't the best burger I ever ate (bone particles), rather pricey, but it filled the void.  The bed was comfortable, the room was clean. Was NOT happy with the high parking fee per day. With the cost of the room, I felt it should have been complimentary, at the very least, cheaper. Location is great, walk to South Coast Plaza, restaurants, and a nice park. Would I stay here again, absolutely!
Manager Response: Dear CKTLS4U,  Thank you for letting us know that the staff was exceptional.  We strive to deliver experiences that are memorable.  Thank you for staying with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I got a room here because its one of the hotels your could have pets stay in. Rather surprised when the valet here told us how much parking would be but still pleased with our choice. Westin's bar and lobby area was stunning as was the water fall outside. Our room was quite clean and comfortable. All in all an enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Dear janiemygirl,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Look forward to seeing you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A beautiful property in an excellent location.  From our check-in with Vickie to our check-out with Kory, our stay was wonderful.  The rooms are spacious, the view overlooking the pool quite nice...and of course the bed provides an extremely soothing sleep.  We loved the seating out by the waterfall off the bar for our late afternoon snack and cocktails.  There are so many restaurants to choose from around the hotel and just over the bridge at the Mall that we had to flip a coin to decide.  We will definitely be coming back to this Westin!!
Manager Response: Dear Quartermaine,  We appreciate your feedback.  It is delightful to know that Kory and Vickie made an impression on your experience with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had to stay at the hotel for a business meeting.  Good hotel. Nice renovation since I was there last.  Very busy, but almost to busy. Staff could have been friendlier especially upon check-in.  Valet parting, well done and worth the cost.  Great location to South Coast Plaza Mall!  Don't Spend too much $$$$$$$$
Manager Response: Dear Larry K,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to our front office team.  We are dedicated to making memorable experiences.  We will continue to keep our staff focused on this.   Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable, accomodating, clean, & did I say comfortable?
Summary: Friendly staff, clean, fast working staff at the front desk getting you checked in & out, comfortable and large rooms. We came for a wedding party for two nights. All guests were talking about the comfortable beds and clean rooms, and we all stay at very nice hotels! I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Homesbyned,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We truly appreciate your business and look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel post surgery. The staff was fantastic. There is abridge to the mall. It is definitely the place to stay if you want to shop till you drop. Wonderful shopping and restaurants near by. It is a dog friendly hote.
Manager Response: Dear darlenelynn,  Thank you for staying with us.  Glad we could meet your needs for your stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Overall decent hotel. To get it out of the way-my two issues w this property are parking and housekeeping. Self parking is $24 daily! Parking is hardly limited in the area and that is just crazy! Housekeeping lacks and one day we came back to our door open! Nothing was gone but just reflects lack of attention. Wifi is avail in lobby areas for free contrary to website. Staff is pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia T,  Thank you for your feedback.  Glad to hear that the hotel was convenient for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Difficult to write a full review as we arrived at the hotel after 10 p.m. and left the next morning.  However, that being said, it was conveniently located near the South Coast Plaza shopping mall and easy on and off the highway.  The night we were there a group of young cheerleaders were in the swimming pool shouting out their cheers.  Although our room was on the 15th floor, we were still able to hear them loud and clear.  After a call to the front desk, we were told that other guests had complained about the noise and that they were trying to resolve the matter albeit, it took almost 45 minutes to do so.  The beds were comfortable and it was quiet after the cheerleaders left the pool, but noisy once the morning cleaning crew came in with doors slamming, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Janice A,  Thank you for letting us know about your experience.  We take your feedback serious and want to make sure all of our guest have a memorable experience.  Our apologies that you were disturbed during your stay.  We will continue to work hard to deliver on our service.  Thank you for sharing with us.

Summary: From the moment we checked in to the moment we left, the service here was impeccable.  The heavenly bed amazing to sleep in! Everything was just perfect, the bell hop that assisted us to our room, the bartenders who got us glasses so we could open our own wine in the beautiful outdoor settings, to the valet, who were always so conscientious and helpful, this will be my landing spot every time I stay in this area!  If you like to work out when you are travelling, my husband loved the Gym, and he is hard to impress.  I had originally planned to stay in Anaheim at a Marriot, but was told the beds weren't so great so made a last minute change to this Westin, was absolutely fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear Jsandh694,  Thank you for letting us know you felt that the hotel and experience was fabulous and was top notch.  Our team is very passionate about service and it appears we delivered for you.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin is an older property in a great Costa Mesa location. If shopping is your thing, having the South Coast Plaza a short walk across a connecting bridge from the hotel makes shopping in a dream location a perfect match. The customer service provided was pleasnt , but a little over rehearsed, anytime you came near the front door someone came running to open the door, a bit uncomfortable when you were just walking by. The staff attention was pleasant, but not natural. My room was clean and comfortable, a chose the green option to receive a $5 daily credit, only received 1 voucher for my 2 night stay. One memorable le feature was the fantastic patio waterfall.In would return for a stat at the Westin if I visit Coast Mesa. I must mention that being on business I attended a
Manager Response: Dear Dan C,  Thank you for staying with us during your business trip.  Our team is dedicated to our guest and we apologize if the attention you received was not want you wanted.  We will share with our team.  Thank you for staying with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very clean rooms with nice views. Comfortable bed and awesome shower. Sitting areas outside are beautiful and the price is very reasonable (aside from parking fees) There were multiple weddings there when stayed. Great location to restaurants/shopping and a walking bridge to connect you there. Will absolutely stay next time in town.
Manager Response: Dear Charlestown,  Thank you for letting us know that your experience with us was great.  Look forward to your return with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel for my business trip!
Summary: I went there for a business trip. It was great! There were people there for vacation, and it made me more relaxed. I loved the artificial waterfall there. The staff was very friendly (Jonathan Sun especially!) I got free upgrade to a suite on the top floor and got some snacks :)
Manager Response: Dear Eileen5566,  Thank you for letting us know that one of our staff made your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay.    Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Attractive hotel with indoor and outdoor lobby and waterfall. The service was consistent with the usual good Westin standard. It is a short walk from a large mall with good options nearby for meals. The rooms were a little dated but clean and comfortable in size. I anticipate staying there again on future business trips.
Manager Response: Dear SeaworthyNewYork,  Thank you for staying with us.  Great to hear that you felt the accomodations were comfortable.  We are renovating our hotel this year so you will hopefully get an opportunity to experience our new hotel experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a lovely hotel connected by a pedestrian bridge to South Coast Plaza.  Very quiet.  Great views of Orange County from the higher floors.  The room, on the SPG floor, was nicely appointed with lots of space and had a very nice bathroom.  The hotel has a beautiful outdoor pool area.  There is an adjoining restaurant as well as a small Starbucks-styled shop in the hotel which serves Starbucks coffee.  Parking (for a fee) is available in the parking structure across the street.  If you are staying in the area to shop or go to Disneyland, this hotel is a step up from most other choices in the area.  I would recommend this hotel for guests who are looking for a more luxurious experience than you would find in a motor inn or a typical three-star hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Love2travel2too,  Having all the amenities and conveniences of a stay is critical and we are delighted to hear that our services met all of your needs.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Westin South Coast Plaza, the name says it all
Summary: The Westin South Coast Plaza is like 50 other Westins in the US.  The quality of the bedding, shower, and furnishings are above average for a hotel. The room service menu is pretty good. I've probably stayed here 20 times in the past 15 years and they have kept the hotel up to date.  The location, a short walk to South Coast Plaza, is also convenient to the airport, UC Irvine, and. Many businesses.  You can't go wrong staying here, but it is lacking a little charm.
Manager Response: Dear GuavaMike Thank you for staying with us.  We value your opinion and look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: A lovely hotel in a nice part of LA
Summary: We always stay at this hotel when in LA as it is in such a beautiful neat and attractive part of town. The hotel suits us as we always fly in from Sydney and arrive in the morning. Every time we arrive we are greeted by friendly efficient check in staff and are given a room promptly. When you are exhausted from a 14 hour flight it's the best when they tell you that your room is ready! The rooms are large and always clean and the Westin 'Heavenly Bed' is divine. Another reason why I love this hotel is that it is about a 3 minute stroll over to South Coast Plaza which is my all time favourite shopping mall! The shops are gorgeous with everything you could ever want to buy. Lovely restaurants with delicious food are also at this complex.  The hotel is quiet and very up market with
Manager Response: Dear JanSydneyA,  We value and appreciate your feedback.  We will make sure that Kory, our front office associate, is informed on how he made you feel during your visit and it made all the difference.  It sounds like it made your stay memorable.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A good business hotel - it's what you would expect from a Westin in a business area. Rooms are clean, spacious with adequate workspace.   The gym is excellent. A car service is available to take you to local offices.  The outside pool area is well designed - you don't feel that you're so close to a freeway interchange.  Minor point is that the bathrooms are a bit tired and could use some updating. Still adequate though.  I biggest complaint is paying for wifi - this seems to be standard thing at big hotels but I simply disagree with the policy. It should be built into the price.   All in all - I'd stay again for business.
Manager Response: Dear Eljefe707,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that you felt all your business needs were met when with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Besides its friendly and attentive staff, seamless service, and wonderful amenities this property is also conveniently located ten minutes from the airport! Right across the street is also South Coast Plaza which by all means caters to any and all looking for a variety of shopping and dining choices. I was very pleased with my 14th floor room overlooking the pool. The room was very clean, the bed was extremely comfortable, and you can't beat the amazingly fast room service. Overall, a great experience and I will be back in the future.
Manager Response: Dear 0372 New York City.,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We are glad to hear that you felt your overall experience was great.  Look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Last weekend, I planned a surprise weekend stay-cation to celebrate my wife's birthday at the Westin South Coast Plaza.  The hotel staff helped make her birthday surprise even better by sending up a bottle of champagne and chocolate dipped strawberries to our upgraded deluxe room.  We enjoyed the convenient hotel location being across the mall with so many choices for fine dining.  Saturday evening was topped off with an unexpected fireworks show (from Angel's stadium) that we enjoyed from the privacy of our room view.  Thanks, Westin!
Manager Response: Dear Mark P,  It is great that you had a special birthday with us.  Glad to hear it was memorable for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Attended a conference and stayed at the Westin South Coast Plaza in Costa Mesa. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The room was comfortable and clean. We appreciated having two comfortable chairs, instead of one. There was a selection of good teas and the coffee was good in the room. Had to call for maid service at 4:30 PM one day, but the hotel compensated us by removing extra charges. Large mall, theatre, and many good restaurants are nearby. Would return if  I have another conference at this Westin.
Manager Response: Dear Ron H,  Thank you for staying with us.  Glad to hear that you felt the team was helpful and friendly during your visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was my 4th visit to this property and it certainly will not be my last.  For this past stay, my husband and I took a long weekend get-away for our wedding anniversary.  When we checked in, we were warmly welcomed back by the front desk agent, and upon entering the room, we found chocolate covered strawberries a bottle of champagne, and a lovely Anniversary card signed by the staff.  The housekeeping staff were extremely detail-oriented, and our room was always immaculate and well-appointed when we returned from our various outings.   Love the staff, love the location, love this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear azsnapdragon,  It is so great to hear that we made an impact on your stay that was special.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Westin, South Coast Plaza many time. My experiences have been uneven. I choose the hotel as I travel for business and it is close to the airport. In addition, the hotel is attached to a mall with many great restaurants nearby.   This stay started well. I was greeted by a friendly staff person.  The hotel lobby is nice and I was offered my Starwood benefits. The room was clean and spacious. My request for a quiet room was honored.  There was a power-strip connected to the desk so it was easy to plug in my computer, tablet, phone, etc.  Everything was good so far.   When it came time to catch my 5:00 am shuttle to the airport, I went to the lobby a few minutes early. I asked if there was any coffee and there was not. But, a nice front desk person offered me a
Manager Response: Dear Russ H,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your stay.  We hope we have you on your next stay with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We live locally but wanted to have a weekend excursion without leaving town.  My husband booked the Shopper's Delight package and we had a fabulous time enjoying the free valet parking at South Coast Plaza, accessing the VIP lounge after shopping all day and topped off the night with free dining at Scott's (using the gift certs).  Jonathan (reservations) and Vickie (front desk) greeted us with a warm welcome upon entry and upgraded us to a wonderful room on the top floor.  It was all in all a wonderful Westin weekend, we are definitely returning soon for another fabulous weekend excursion.
Manager Response: Dear Laura P,  The hotel is truly a "shoppers delight."  We hope that we will have you on our next visit.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had a complex stay booked at this hotel: several nights, with family members all arriving and leaving at different times. The staff at the hotel easily coped with what I thought might be difficult issues. The front desk staff were very helpful and fulfilled all our complex requests with ease. We had a wonderful stay, largely due to the front desk, valet and airport shuttle staff. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Chris W,  Glad to hear you felt your experience was excellent.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Here's the yin and the yang of the Westin South Coast Plaza.  Lobby and public areas -- GORGEOUS Guest rooms -- Appropriate only for those dying to have a 'Best Western' experience   Customer Service At Dining Areas and Bar --  VERY POLITE AND PLEASANT  Customer Service at Front Desk -- Apathetic bordering on rude   I could do the "patterns" thing all day long.  But to bring some heft to the discussion, the South Coast Plaza has spent large amounts of money and care on its public areas, but is apparently leaving its guest rooms for last.  Since I can't sleep in the lobby, I need to give more weight to my room, which was borderline dirty -- with mildew in the shower and lots of dust covering the A/C unit.   The front desk wasn't too concerned with my upset, as I was told there
Manager Response: Dear CleoPatraLa,  Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding to your experience. Our team takes your comments very serious and are dedicated to taking action on any guest concerns.  We hope we get another opportunity to deliver for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel was the complete package: great service, wonderful location, perfect accommodations. My only complaint was that since this was a business stay, I didn't have enough time to enjoy the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Duggle1,  Thank you for letting us know that it was a wonderful visit for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay - for the shopping!
Summary: The Westin is right across the street from the South Coast Plaza.  This means it is PERFECTLY located for the shoppers out there.  The hotel is older but very clean, staff is courteous, and wonder amenities.  Lots of food options nearby.  Highly recommended for the shoppers out there.
Manager Response: Dear Paul C,  It can be about a shoppers haven when staying with us.  The close distance to The South Coast Plaza can be critical to a great stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stay here every few months for work and it is an easy hotel to get to and you have easy access to the mall with lots of great shopping and food options.  The last two times i've stayed it has been relatively noisy but i'm not sure if I just got put on the floors with kids or if it is always that loud.    The hotel is really clean and the check in service is great.  It is definitely a business hotel with easy check in and check out but they really don't do anything above or beyond that makes this hotel stand out.  The beds are great and super comfy!  The gym and pool are nice too.   I will
Manager Response: Dear Kallie1269,  Our team does everything in their power to provide a seamless experience for our guests.  It is all about providing a better you when you leave.  Look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We couldn't have asked for a nicer stay.  Traveled to Southern California to meet family and attend The KC Royals game..Quiet and wonderful facility.  Staff was very accommodating and took excellent care of us...Shuttle to and from airport..
Manager Response: Dear Dew345,  It can be so important to have that peaceful environment when traveling so you can unwind.  Glad to hear that the stay met those needs for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was teaching a class at this venue.  I'd been here before for meetings, but never had stayed overnight.  Good sized rooms, comfy beds, everything was sparkling clean including hallways and lobby areas.  Some rooms overlook the water feature at the back of the property and that would have been nice.  My room overlooked the front of the hotel - my guess is that was a lesser expensive room, and since my room was being reimbursed, I had no control over the room that I stayed in. I came in a day early so that I could shop at South Coast Plaza.  Out the front door of the hotel and to the left is a walking overpass of Bristol Street right to the front door of South Coast Plaza - shopper's heaven in Orange County.  But if you aren't a shopper, South Coast Plaza is still a great place
Manager Response: Dear Marcia H,  We understand how critical it is when you are traveling and working at a hotel to be at your best.  It is wonderful to hear that we were able to allow you to be at your best when you were with us.  Our Service staff will be happy to hear that you felt they were able to meet your needs when with us.  We look forward to having you on your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I'm in at least two hotels a week, at least three weeks a month.  The majority of those stays are at Starwood properties.  I rate hotels the following way: * - I left and found another place to stay ** - Never staying here again *** - Didn't like it, wouldn't stay here again unless I absolutely had too **** - Great stay ***** - My hotel when I'm in this area  I stayed at this hotel for two nights at the end of May.  I never know exactly what to expect when I book a Westin or a Sheraton, they are sort of like the Buick and Oldsmobile of the Starwood group.  They can be really nice, or a disappointment.  This hotel is on the really nice side.   After I found the entrance I was greeted by the valet attendant who expeditiously got my car settled.  The valet service is just a tad
Manager Response: Dear Bearpster,  We value you as a frequent traveler of Starwood properties.  It is valuable to us to hear that you felt our team stood out from your experiences and delivered on your needs when with us.  Our team is dedicated to ensuring all our guests feel welcome.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Loved it, nice large rooms, comfy bed and really good service
Summary: I was traveling for a business trip in California and I stayed for 3 nights in this hotel. The service at the reception was more than polite it was warm and welcoming. The Room was spotless, it is very spacious with large TV flat screens, comfy bed, in short everything you expect from an Hotel Check-in and Check-out were easy and quick.    Breakfast at the restaurant downstairs was delicious and reasonably priced.   Location is also great since you get a huge mall with all the retail shops just minutes away walking from the Hotel.  Cam't say much more, good service, good rooms good FnB, just thank you for keeping up standards and making guess happy.
Manager Response: Dear Pierre-Marc L,  At Westin, we strive to deliver on our guests needs in every interaction we have.  We are delighted to hear that you felt our guest room and service delivered on your needs.  Guest Relation Manager

Summary: we flew down to l.a. to attend our son's master's convocation from Concordia university. we flew into john wayne airport which was a terrific decision, as so central and very little traffic. we were on the top floor, the 16th, good views of the area. we enjoyed the pool every afternoon after our daily sojourns. at poolside there were towels provided, iced lemon water, and it was nicely decorated with plants, and very clean. we had breakfast each morning in the well run takeaway coffee spot in the hotel. there was a restaurant in the hotel however we didn't try it. it looked great. we were happy with our room. the best part about the hotel was it's location. we were a 10 minute drive to the university, and Newport, laguna and huntington beaches. for shoppers, there was an amazing
Manager Response: Dear JudyMichael40,  Our location truly does allow our guests to be able to unwind and relax.  We are delighted that it made all the difference for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great location. We walked to Panera for breakfast and shopping center/mall nearby. Parking is $22/day, room key programmed & automatically charged to your room daily. No free Wi-Fi. Used heated pool twice during our 4 night stay. $5 voucher each night housekeeping is declined. Got it once & used it at Starbucks in lobby. Clean, convenient, comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Pamaseeta,  It is great that our hotel allowed you to be relaxed and the services were convenient.  We do offer free Wi-Fi in our lobby for all of our guests should that be an option that would work for you on your next visit.  We look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel.   The room was fantastic, bed was comfy and the bathroom was nice, but the AC was a little noisy.  Plenty of working space for a business traveler.   Did not get a chance to try the restaurant, but it had a nice menu.
Manager Response: Dear Got2GetAway,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  Glad to hear that you felt the hotel guest room was fantastic for you.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Westin for 2 nights for work. I arrived in the late evening and was pleased that check-in was quick and easy. I was given room 707, which had a pool view. I didn't expect the hotel would have such a nice pool with a fountain. My first impression of the room was that it was simply like any other standard room at Westins, Sheratons, and Four Points Sheratons. The decor was very plain with brown and beige hues. Since the hotel was next to South Coast Plaza, I thought the Westin would be a bit more luxurious and modern.  Overall, my stay was fine and I'd go back again because of the great location. There were a few things though that could be improved. Though my room was on the 7th floor, I could still hear the traffic outside and the noise from the fountain by the
Manager Response: Dear LC411,  We are thankful that you stayed with us.  We appreciate your valuable feedback regarding to your experience.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed here several times over the last few years. Most recently, this week I stayed at this Westing property for a night for business. This is a great location, i.e. walking distance to the South Coast Plaza Mall. I had meetings in the Irvine area and this is a good place to stay. Staff is friendly and helpful. Room and clean and spacious. Hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool, which is nice when the weather is 90F.
Manager Response: Dear Monsoonpho,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  Our staff will be happy to hear that you felt they were helpful and friendly for your visit with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing employees from housekeeping to the operator
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel twice now and both stays went fabulously. The valet is always quick to respond to my arrival (it's worth the extra $10 to valet) and the welcome desk has been quick and efficient both times. Michael checked me in and we chatted about my job. I have a background in hotel front desk so I was pretty critical - he hit all the check in points and also made conversation.   The room was nice - a deluxe room facing south on the 14th floor. Everything was clean, lights worked, and bed was heavenly (pun intended). Kudos to housekeeping. Even the public areas were spotless at all times.  I went to the bar that night. Pretty average... The bartender could have made better small talk rather than keeping his head down the whole time. Kiana stepped in halfway though
Manager Response: Dear nsfurey,  Our team values your feedback and wants to do everything we can to deliver for our guests during their visit with us.  We look forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Staff is pretentious. checked in very late were told they only had they were at 97% capacity and gave us a room with two double beds which barely worked.  The halls were loud. We were on the fifth floor you could hear traffic outside overall a pretty property but the rooms and staff need some help. At 97% there were still rooms available on price line. Would not recommend to travelers unless they are on business.
Manager Response: Dear Karen5590,  We hope that you will get an opportunity to see our hotel when we renovate later this year. Guest Relation Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I did a stay-cation to get out of LA for the weekend at Westin South Coast Plaza. I wish the weekend was longer. Lounging at the pool and dining at Pinot were some highlights from our stay.  I won't complain about the parking situation because every hotel charges so I've learned to suck it up.  The staff was amazing. Shout out to Jasmine, Jerry, Nadine and Alex? (Bartender).
Manager Response: Dear Jessica L,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We are delighted that our team made an impression on your stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: For whatever reason I was expecting a nicer establishment than what is there. Seems like they bought out a cheaper franchise and slapped their logo on the front and charge more. Unfortunately,  I have nothing to compare it to in the area so I will give 5 stars until I can thoroughly review it. It may be the best if the rest are worse. Just have a hard time believing that.
Manager Response: Dear samiam1356,  Thank you for providing your feedback.  We hope you will get another opportunity to stay with us.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 1 night to get enough stays (25/year) to maintain my Platinum status.  Everything was OK.  Picked up 500 points instead of breakfast at the coffee shop. Parking was $20 self parking.  You have to walk a block or 2 away, depending on where you park.   Most of the Sheraton hotel in the US are just average.  I save my points to stay at the ones in Asia.  They are wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Tom Y,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I just recently returned from an excellent visit to this hotel. This has been one of my favorite hotels in the Irvine-Costa Mesa area for awhile. Unfortunately, I had not been to the area for awhile.  The hotel's exterior areas were as impressive as ever. The room was so very nice. It is nicely decorated. The staff is superb. They are very professional and attentive. The hotel is very conveniently located to South Coast shopping and business areas. Hopefully, I will be returning to the area very soon.
Manager Response: Dear Vincent M,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza.  It is great to hear that you felt your visit met all your needs.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I'm was on a business trip and checkin at the Westin. I upgraded to a jr suite through the internet for a minimal fee. When I arrived the rooms were filling up fast do to a seminar. They moved me into a room that was ready, however it was older and kinda dirty. The management actually went to the room and agreed. They moved me into a larger room with a bottle of wine and apologized. They didn't have to do that, but they know service. I'll be back for years to come do to this great Serice experience. Thank you Westin.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  It is great to hear that we made the difference in your stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Very accessible to lots of great stuff!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a convention that was held at the Segerstrom Center and this hotel was the perfect location, within walking distance on a night, lit path - even in the rain.  There are a lot of restaurants nearby, as well as a mall, and a gelato parlor you can walk to just about a block away!   I tried to order room service for breakfast, but I called three times and there was no answer.  I do know that the hotel was pretty full of people from the convention that I attended, but I don't really think that's a great reason, they really should be able to operate at full capacity. Also, there is a hotel bar but, again, there were TONS of people there and only 2 bartenders, of which they DID work their butts off and tried to get to everyone. Still, they just really should
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.  We will share with the appropriate leaders at the hotel to ensure we can grow our service from it.  Look forward to your return stay. Guest relations manager

Summary: the staff was great, the location was wonderful and the rooms were just right! We checked in and found that our rooms had two full beds when we asked for king.  We were quickly transferred to two rooms next to each other with king beds. The service in the Pinot restaurant was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear H G,  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you with us again. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: THE STAFF MAKES THIS HOTEL! GREAT JOB!
Summary: The staff at the Westin South Coast Plaza were extremely efficient, friendly and thoroughly professional. It took less than 3 minutes for us to check in and about a minute for my check out. After a long day of shopping, we decided to check back into the Westin for an additional night and the manager upgraded us to a nice suite. I must say that I rarely see staff this helpful and pleasant. This Hotel is located right next to the mall and lots of great restaurants. This is definitely the only hotel for us while staying in the Orange County area. Sorry St. Regis and The Montage....but the service at the Westin as earned our business from now on! Thank you again!
Manager Response: Dear LasVegasGuy,  It is great to hear that our hotel has gained your loyalty and that our staff has made the difference.  We truly value you as a guest and look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Hotel is literally right across the street form South Coast Plaza.  A walking bridge gives easy access to the mall.  Michael at the front desk recommended the Capital Grill...excellent choice.  The rooms are nicely appointed and roomy.
Manager Response: Dear Mybloodhound,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We truly appreciate you as a valued guest.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights for a work conference. This was my 4th visit to this hotel and once again, I was impressed. Customer service is excellent! Nadine, at the front desk, is a true professional in every way. Whoever hired her should be promoted for their good decision making ability! As always, the beds were so comfy. The conference facility is excellent, and the food and the service provided during the conference was just great. The shuttle back and forth to the John Wayne Airport is a real plus. I will always stay at this Westin when in this area.
Manager Response: Dear NurseNancy12,  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your visit and all aspects of your stay were met.  We truly look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed for a night for business.  It is a typical newly refreshed Westin.  The room was clean and quiet.  What gets me about Westins now is that they all have the same room service menu so as a Starwood member I get the same food no matter where I go which is boring.  However, the food I ordered was good and arrived in a timely manner.  The phone on the desk wasn't working but that's minor.  The rooms are large and there's plenty of workspace.  Self parking is a short walk away so pretty convenient.
Manager Response: Dear reallypickylady,  Thank you for your feedback regarding our Room Service menu.  We value your opinion. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Here for work - very nice hotel
Summary: Stayed here two nights for a work conference. Was leading a group of 25 who stayed in the hotel so was upgraded to a sweet corner room. Huge room and very much what you would expect from a Westin. Ate at the French restaurant one night and it was very good. Breakfast and lunch for our conference was very high quality. Would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Pete D,  Thank you for staying with us during your work conference.  Glad to hear that our hotel associates were able to take care of you well.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice lobby, average rooms, friendly staff!
Summary: Recently stayed at this hotel for 4 nights for a business conference. Was impressed with the bar and lobby area and particularly enjoyed having lunch in the open courtyard. Didn't use the pool but it looked decent with some nice wee palm trees to remind you that you're in CA.  The rooms didn't really bowl me over but they were large, clean and offered great views out towards the coast. One nice touch was that the receptionist noticed that we were traveling with our 5 month old baby and had a crib delivered to our room whilst we were out exploring the local area. That seemed to me to typify the staff who I found to be polite and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Mark-English1,  Thank you for staying with us.  We hope we get another opportunity to provide you with The Westin experience. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stay was great. Parking is a little high, but self-parking is suitable.  Rooms are nice and clean. A little outdated and could use a re-model, but I am not complaining.  Pools were nice and clean.  They were doing some maintenance around the area so we didn't use it much, but overall - great stay.  Free wi-fi in the lobby, but a charge in the rooms.  Lobby is beautiful, but the rooms could use some TLC. I'm not picky so this was a great stay for me and my family.  Valet guys were great!  They always opened the door for us.  There is a bridge that connect directly to the south coast plaza - which was a huge plus if you want to shop!  Lots of convienent fast-food places nearby.  Overall - great stay. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Macani S,  Thank you for letting us know how your experience was.  We take pride in our guest's experiences and are delighted to inform you that we are expecting a guest room renovation coming this year.  The newly remodeled guest rooms will truly be an experience for our guests.  We hope that you will have another opportunity to visit our great property especially when the new product is complete. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We hosted a wedding for our daughter at a nearby venue, so we booked several rooms and a suite here for the wedding party.  The location is great as it is close to John Wayne Airport, the 405, has a nice indoor waterfall which is lovely for photos and a nice lobby, but the management of the hotel needs a lot more TLC for the customers to make it a good destination.  We had problems with valet parking, confusion over the booking dates, rooms on the wrong floor, etc. The suite, which is 2 rooms, was very pricey.
Manager Response: Dear RAINBOW1,  Thank you for providing your feedback regarding to your stay.  Our leadership team truly embraces the opportunity to deliver on exactly what our guests value.  We hope to have you stay with us on your next visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is one of my favorite places to stay.   Close to John Wayne airport, Southcoast and Newport Plaza, 405 and more.  Rooms are always comfortable and atmosphere is nice so even the dogs are plentiful and welcomed here. Always a pleasant stay even if quick for 1 night before heading out.   If you are lucky you can catch a good deal on the weekend here
Manager Response: Dear Rich W,  Thank you for choosing us when your travels bring you to Costa Mesa.  We are refreshed to hear that you feel our hotel provides the comfort and atmosphere you are looking for.

Summary: All Westin Expectations met here!  walking distance to many fantastic restaurants.  We had breakfast at Hotel's restaurant, Pinot Provence. Great breakfast in a great rustic French setting. I recommend this hotel if you have business in the Costa Mesa area, bring your wife along so she can go shopping at South Coast Plaza.
Manager Response: Dear Philp N,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  It is wonderful that you felt our location met all your needs.  Guest Relation Manager

Summary: This property has severe uncleanliness issues. As a Platinum and Ambassador member with SPG, I travel for business every week and over the past 11 months of staying at this property (only because it is the only SPG property near my client), I have been shocked at the level of filth I continue to find in my room stay after stay. Several months ago, I encountered bed bugs crawling across my pillow when going to sleep. Not to mention the obvious health and sanitation issues, after experiencing the extreme inconvenience of packing up all of my belongings and switching rooms at 11pm, the way the situation was handled by hotel staff was outrageous . Nobody from the hotel, let alone management, called me the following day to attempt to understand the situation, to see if I needed my
Manager Response: Dear shibs23,  Thank you for your feedback.  We will continue to ensure that our property team works hard to provide experiences that allow our guests to be at their best.  Our apologies that we did not deliver that type of experience for you when you were with us.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here recently for a long weekend.  The hotel is nice and clean.  The lobby is pretty and the water feature adds a nice touch.  When we booked we had wanted a double room, but there were none available so we said ok to a king with a roll away.  When we checked in the roll away was not in the room yet so I called and it was there shortly.  Everything we requested was taken care of very quickly.  The room had plenty of room for the 3 of us and even though it was by the elevator we were not bothered by noise.   A couple of things we did not like: the shuttle transportation could not be reserved so we had to search and wait for a cab one morning.  We were able to get assistance with getting the cab and it ended up being cheaper so that worked out well.  Also, the restaurant
Manager Response: Dear tracyandalex, Thank you for letting us know that you felt you could relax when staying with us.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here on our babymoon. This was actually the best Westin experience I've ever had!  We redeemed Starwood points to stay here and chose this location to be close to Newport, Balboa Island and Laguna.   First, Joe, who checked us in and casually asked about our purpose for the stay. Less than an hour after checking in we were extremely surprised by a gift of healthy treats and chilled waters along with a hand-written note from Joe. He even remembered the baby's name!! We were blown away!  Second, they had a self-park option which was reasonably priced and convenient.   Last, the pool was surprisingly nice, clean and lovely to use.   Overall this was an excellent Westin property which surprised us a bit due to the corporate Costa Mesa location. Can't
Manager Response: Dear Mr.&Mrs.D,  Thank you for staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that Joe made an impact on your visit.  We look forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great for shopping and day trips to beach
Summary: Stayed with family with small kids. Spent 4 nights here.great base for day trips to beach and convenient for shopping at mall. We had a room that looked out on pool which was beautiful. Pool was a great place to hang out with free wifi. One point though is that the pool is very deep. Limited shallow area so not ideal if children are not strong swimmers.
Manager Response: Dear Heather M,  We are glad that you felt that our location helped you be able to shop and enjoy a day trip.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This Westin hotel is the best Westin that I have ever been to. It looks comfortable and is furnished with a neat look. The lobby is large and spacious with the access to an outdoor pool and a fountain. The rooms are pretty cozy with a wonderful view looking out towards the front of the hotel, where the big Christmas tree is. The pool area is pretty beautiful, and although I have not swum in it I say that the experience of swimming in the pool is wonderful. Overall, this Westin is very new and luxurious.
Manager Response: Dear Annie M,  Thank you for staying with us.  We strive to meet all your needs when visiting and we are refreshed to hear that you felt our hotel was the best Westin you have experienced. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was recently here for a 1 night stay for business.  It is a typical older Westin property - the lobby is fairly new but the rooms could use an update soon. Everything is clean and functional.   I used the pool but they could do a better job with the cleaning. There are a couple of empty plastic cups sitting on the bottom of the pool. I appreciate I was there in December and it is not heavily in use but it should be clean and trash free. The gym is also interestingly located in an annex.  The wifi internet was very fast.
Manager Response: Dear Davidpoon13,  Thank you for staying with us at our hotel.  We hope to see you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Recently stayed for a business conference. Lovely property. Helpful and friendly staff. Walking distance from South Coast Plaza which is wonderful shopping. Too cold for the pool, but it looked amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly R, We are delighted to hear that you felt our team was helpful and friendly. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Luxury and cozy stay at the westin
Summary: The room was spacious and the staff were perfect. The service was quick and nice. Front desk agents were welcoming and friendly. Nice bed and pillows-was a great sleep. I loved the city view and very close to south coast plaza. Perfect!!
Manager Response: Dear Eun,  It is so great to have your visit meet all your needs of comfort.  We hope to see you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Westin In Name -- Just Not In The Rooms
Summary: Not to be the South Coast Scrooge -- but it's really about time that the Westin South Coast Plaza remodeled its rooms.  I've stayed here on occasion over the years -- but this was the time where it really hit me that this place needs a refresh.  Absolutely, the service is quick, pleasant, and up to Westin standards.  The lobby is pretty much gorgeous.  Which is to say, there have clearly been some dollars invested in a "public area" refresh.  But geez folks... the rooms really need the same TLC.
