Our room had a few mysterious stains on the ceiling.  We also observed some staining on the wall near the bed.  One of the bath towels was frayed and torn.  Items like these don't equate with a 4-star hotel that likes to feed off the luxury panache of South Coast Plaza across the
Manager Response: Dear CleoPatralLaJ, We are dedicated to providing exceptional service and product to all of our guests and are extremely focused on this.  Our property is scheduled for a guest room renovation in 2014.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to deliver for you in all the ways you require.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: ...from the Segerstrom Center and shopping at the South Coast Plaza. Recently attended a concert at the Segerstrom and, not relishing the long drive home late at night, chose to stay at the Westin. The staff were delightful and couldn't have been more helpful and the walk to the theatre  less than five minutes (in high heels!) We were able to walk from the hotel across the bridge to the South Coast Plaza before the concert for our early dinner reservation  and did the same the following morning for brunch and shopping. It made for a perfect weekend and I am now planning more of the same.
Manager Response: Dear Travelbug607,  It is so essential to be in the center of it all.  We are glad to hear that we made that possible for you during your visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Costa Mesa
Summary: Great hotel and staff. Location is very close to South Coast Plaza. Grab a quick coffee at the hotel lobby Starbucks then go for a stroll across the Unity Bridge to SCP where there are so many shops and eating options. Leave the car for day trips to Newport Beach and further afield. Looking forward to staying at this wonderful hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear ozbiz,  Good to hear that you felt our hotel was wonderful.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, Obvious Business Hotel, but Great for Shopping Travelers, too
Summary: The location is killer.  If you‚Äôre looking for a nice central spot that makes it easy to get to the beaches, theme parks, shopping, and LA, this is a great choice.  This is a popular business hotel because of its proximity to many of the financial and consulting companies located in this area.  They really do cater to the business crowd, so you won‚Äôt find as many tourists, but if you‚Äôre here to shop and plan on visiting some of the other sites in Orange County, then this is a great option.  You can walk to South Coast Plaza and there are plenty of food options very close to the hotel.  You‚Äôre also right off of the freeway, so you can get around easily.  I stayed in a Jr Suite.  It‚Äôs basically 2 rooms with the lock-off doors open.  One of the rooms has a dedicated king bed and
Manager Response: Dear Cournech,  We are delighted we could enhance your experience by giving you one of our suites.  We look forward to having you back on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager.

Summary Heading: Five star reduced to three star
Summary: So we stayed at the Westin last Saturday night because we had dinner at Pinot Provence (which was very good) and drank a tone of great wine. We planned on sleeping in and have brunch at the hotel before heading back to LA, but we were told that the entire restaurant had been rented out for brunch and there was nowhere to eat in the entire hotel. the suggested a bagel at the Starbucks....really? Not exactly the fancy champagne brunch we were looking for. The desk just blew us off and suggested we get in the car and drive around, we were sure to find something to eat. Funny I had just rated the hotel 5 stars in an email I returned from Westin but thank god I waited to review here.
Manager Response: Dear LiliyG,  Thank you for your feedback.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns.  We will make sure we better equip our team to handle your important requests so they can provide a memorable stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I know its a lil late, but I stayed here while ago visiting someone very special :) The lobby was very nice and clean. I loved the color scheme and it was inviting . My room was very clean and big, and the bed was amazing! Super comfortable. It is a stone throw away from the mall (south coast plaza) and is close to the airport (SNA) and major access roads. I would stay here again, the staff was friendly, and checking in and out was super easy. Wonderful hotel and a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth P,  Thank you for letting us know how your March visit was.  It is refreshing to hear that you felt the hotel design was pleasing to your senses.  It is important to be able to enjoy yourself in every way. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff was so friendly and helpful. The beds were amazing. I was well rested. Our view was beautiful and the pool and waterfall outside were gorgeous.  We traveled with our 2 kids and they made us all feel welcome. I especially liked that to use the elevator you need a room key. It made me feel more secure.
Manager Response: Dear Rosanne C,  Thank you so much for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We are comforted that you felt secure at our hotel.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin South Coast Plaza is my favorite hotel in Orange County. It is conveniently located off the I-405. I stay here several times per year for business and have always found the staff to be very courteous and professional. The hotel is beautifully decorated and rooms are clean with a modern decor. The hotel is connected to the South Coast Plaza Shopping Center via a walking bridge that has an abundance of shops and restaurants. After a long work day, taking a stroll on the walking bridge to the shopping center can be very relaxing, and a time to take in some fresh air. As a platinum member, I was once upgraded to one of their suites which was spacious and quite impressive. However, I found their upgrades to be mixed -- rarely receiving an  upgrade since then. Their
Manager Response: Dear ZenSerendipity,  We appreciate your feedback and glad to hear that you feel the hotel is one of your favorite in Orange County. Our team takes pride in delivering exceptional service. We look forward to your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It was a decent hotel in Los Angeles. Stayed there only for one night and would recommend for business travelers. there is a shopping mall just opposite the hotel. The staff was very friendly (Except one in the restaurant, but may be only my experience) rooms are quite good, check in is superfast and always smiling front office staff.
Manager Response: Dear Hashiq,  Thank you for your feedback.  We are glad to hear that you felt your experience was very good.  We will make sure that we share your concerns with our restaurant.  We hope to see you back at our hotel on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Not the fanciest rooms, but a great location for business or fun. Adjacent to South Coast Plaza for great shopping on one side, and Segestrom Hall for concerts in the other.  A courtesy airport shuttle to John Wayne Airport (leather appointed Suburban) is icing on the cake.
Manager Response: Dear Michael F,  We delight in the fact that you felt your experience was Stellar. Our team takes pride in all the touch points of service.  Look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel in a prime location. It is across the street from South Coast. It is also convenient to the business areas. It is also  convenient to restaurants,airport,beaches. The hotel restaurant is excellent as well. The rooms were large and very comfortable. The service was excellent. I look forward to another visit.
Manager Response: Dear Susan F,  It is a pleasure to be able to deliver on all your expectations and that you look forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed here on business in Irvine. Ordinarily I would stay closer to the beach but this hotel was well equipped with a nice lobby and nice rooms. The pool was large in size. Checkin was easy. Breakfast was efficient. Nice proximity to the mall. I would stay here again on business. For vacation I would stay closer to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear avidgolfer2010,  Being able to meet all your business needs makes all the difference.  Glad to hear that you felt that we delivered that experience for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location for Southern California adventures
Summary: My girlfriends and I needed a hotel that had easy access to John Wayne Airport as well as S. Cal. sites and this place was just the ticket. We were initially given to rooms adjacent to each other but wanted connecting. One of the desk staff actually made the change over the phone and met us at the elevator with new keys. The rooms are large, clean, beds comfortable. The hotel is in easy walking distance of many wonderful restaurants and the South Coast Plaza Mall. I would stay here again without pause.
Manager Response: Dear Noni53,  We are glad to hear that our team was able to respond to your needs appropriately during your visit.  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to address your concerns.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Rooms but limited food options
Summary: I've stayed in this hotel on a number of occasions.  The hotel is close to the shopping plaza.  The rooms are the standard Westin rooms with the heavenly bed and shower.  There is a overpriced starbucks on site and there is a shuttle service to and from the airport.  I normally don't check in until 10pm by which time, my food options are limited to the bar or room service.  The restaurant closes at 10pm and it isn't opened on a Monday.  What I hadn't appreciated is that there is no restaurant for breakfast.  Your options are stale muffins at Starbucks or room service.  I've never experienced that before and it strikes me as rather odd.  So if you are looking for breakfast then I'd give this hotel a miss.
Manager Response: Dear RunnerJac,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your experience with our breakfast options.  We are committed to delivering experiences that meet all traveling needs.  We have shared your feedback with our Food and Beverage leadership so we can continue to enhance our guest experiences with our property.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity when traveling to Westin. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and classic Westin hospitality
Summary: I came here for a meeting with about 75 people.  The rooms were nice, the lobby was clean, and meeting rooms were spacious and nicely appointed.  I have many food allergies and the catering easily accommodated my needs.  The hotel is in an area with other sky rises, and walking distance to an upscale mall.  My biggest complaint is they only have 1 set of bathrooms in the lobby which is not near all of the meeting rooms.  It was a good 10 minutes round-trip for a short bathroom break which isn't ideal for those considering a meeting here.  If you don't do the valet parking, it's a little bit of a walk to your car. Overall, there wasn't anything special about this hotel that makes it any better or worse than any Westin.  Nice hotel, but easily forgettable.
Manager Response: Dear TravelingSinc,  We are delighted to hear that our catering team was able to meet all your needs with your meeting.  Our team is dedicated in making memorable experiences and we hope that we have another opportunity to be able to make a real connection to the hotel on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, location and service for business
Summary: Great location with easy access to main business or leisure locations. Limited car parking but wonderful rooms, food, wifi quality and rooftop gym. Added extra with in-hotel starbucks  An excellent business hotel. Would definitely stay again next time in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth L, We are glad you felt the hotel was a great hotel and the service was excellent.  We look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent service, especially for complimentary stay
Summary: I took my wife to the Westin for a simple little stay-cation for her birthday, and received fantastic, friendly service from Joyce and other staff members.  Upon checking in, Joyce asked if we were celebrating anything special.  When we told her it was my wife's birthday, she wished her happy birthday, upgraded our room for us, gave us late checkout (4 PM), and gave us a 50% discount on our parking, all without us asking and all for free.  After settling in to our room, a complimentary box of chocolates and a card signed by the staff was delivered to our room by another friendly staff member who again wished my wife happy birthday.  We received this unexpectedly wonderful treatment even though we were not paying a dollar for our stay (we were using a gift certificate that we
Manager Response: Dear Christopher W,  Thank you so much for letting us know that one of our staff exceeding your expectation and made a memorable moment for you.  We will make sure she knows how she made you feel. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: GREAT HOTEL FOR BUSINESS OR PLEASURE
Summary: We come down here to see plays at the South Coast Repertory which is just across the way from the Westin. A one minute walk. The Orange County Performing Arts Center is right next to SCR. Another minute. Or you can walk across the bridge to South Coast Plaza with its high end shops and restaurants in under 10 minutes  Just a great location.  The lobby is beautiful with a lobby bar looking out onto a waterfall behind. The staff are very welcoming and after they know you ( we come here about 6 times a year) your wish is their command. The deluxe rooms facing the park are what you want, particularly in summer when the Eastern exposure will keep the room a lot cooler. If you are a member of Starwood, you also get a lot of perquisites.  The rooms are large and tastefully
Manager Response: Dear Jean H,  Thank you for staying with us.  It is so important to be able to enjoy yourself at a hotel for what ever reason you are traveling.  We are glad we met your expectations on your visit.  Guest Relation Manager

Summary: I was extremely impressed with my most recent stay at this hotel. The room  was quite large and very comfortable. It was tastefully decorated. The staff was excellent. The location is very convenient to South Coast and the surronding business area. There are many restaurants ro select from. I was also impressed with the hotel's French restaurant. It is  very convenient to SNA. as well. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear James W,  Glad to see that you felt all your stay details fit into place.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I live relatively close to this hotel and chose to stay here as some friends and i were going out to a concert that night and did not want to worry about driving after. Got a nice upgrade to accommodate some guests for a preparty too! The front desk was great about accommodating requests as well. The X factor was the guest services staff. It seemed to be a slower day at this hotel and they offered to drive us to the venue and pick us up after. Small fee but it was way better than taking a cab and waiting for one after the show. This property has a great central location in Orange County. Room service was also surprisingly good even compared to fancier hotels. Well done everyone
Manager Response: Dear DK_ninjaaaaa,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your experience.  It is great to hear that you felt it was excellent.  We look forward to having you back with us on your next journey to Westin.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I first visited this hotel for a business meeting, then stayed here on a subsequent visit.  The lobby and conference facilities are both nice, with an attentive staff.  I found the room, for the most part, to be up-to-date.  The caveat is that numerous other Westin properties tend to have rooms that are a bit more updated.  The location is perfect for business meeting, or for those who are tourists.
Manager Response: Dear kwward1,  We are delighted that you feel our hotel staff are attentative and meet your needs.  We look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel because my husband was attending a conference that was in house.  I was very pleased with the overall service and value at this property. We stayed with our 2 children and it helped that in the lobby area was a "Starbucks" grab and go so we could grab breakfast each morning. Lovely outdoor pool area and very easy walking distance to South Coast Plaza (there is a footbridge that connects the hotel to South Coast Plaza so one doesn't even need to contemplate crossing the road. Rooms were spacious, quiet and housekeeping staff were amazing.  My daughter came down with a bug and housekeeping were very helpful in assisting us with all that we needed. Highly recommend and would stay again
Manager Response: Dear Roberta G,  We are glad that when you were here for business that you were able to have some family fun while staying with us.  Our Housekeeping staff will be excited to hear that they were able to deliver for your needs when staying with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: THE place to stay in Irvine
Summary: If you must stay at a hotel in Irvine, this is where you must stay!.     Been here for ages now, and I'm happy about it since I had my Bar Mitzvah here, but this place works for families, couples, and business goers alike.    Close to the Mall, and it is THE mall to end all Malls.   In fact, they even have their own cool bridge from the establishment to the mall.  Fine dining just down your elevator.  Ortega, Maestros, and Fridays if you are out till 2AM Rooms are awesome and spacious.     You wont really get any of this at the Hyatt or Marriott.
Manager Response: Dear SonicSpringBok,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We are glad to hear that the convenient location and amenities of the hotel met all your needs.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My wife stayed here on business, but she doesn't write TripAdvisor reviews, so she asked me to post it.  My wife was in Irvine to host a meeting for about 50 people and spent the night before the conference at the Westin.  Before going to sleep she realized she didn't have all the documents she needed and forgot her toothpaste.  First thing in the morning she called the front desk and talked to an exceptional staff person, Jonathan Sun, who told her not to worry about anything.  She emailed her documents to him and in a few minutes the copies and the toothpaste were delivered.  My wife stays in a lot of hotels for business travel, but Mr. Sun made this hotel experience outstanding!
Manager Response: Dear SBpicky,  Thank you for taking a moment to recognize Jonathan from our Service Express team.  Our team takes pride in delivering on our guest experiences and we will make sure he is aware of how you made your stay memorable.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good location for where I was working.
Summary: Hotel is nice and the location is good.  As others have stated you can walk across the pedestrian bridge to the South Coast Plaza mall.  There are quite a few restaurant choices at the mall.  There is a nice pool and work out area as well.
Manager Response: Dear Lee C,  The close proximity of our walking bridge to South Coast Plaza truly enables you to be able to shop at your leisure.  Look forward to your return. Guest Relation Manager

Summary: Nightly price is high. But hotel has plenty of amenities. Great pool and outdoor waterfall make for a cool place to smoke a cigar or drink morning coffee. I was here on business. Meeting rooms are plentiful and staff is very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights.  Everyone was friendly, clean rooms, nice property. I didn't eat there or use any amenities, but I am sure they are good as well.  Nothing over the top, but definitely meets all westin standards.
Manager Response: Dear Brabus,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We hope to see you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: You know your on the road a bit too much when the valets, bellmen, bar tender, and front desk start to recogonize you.   I guess I have over 30 nights here in the last few years.  Glad to see some new room service options and the chef's nightly special on offer.  Great service as always.  Thanks to all for the continued level of personal service I'd never expect at a Westin.
Manager Response: Dear SPGwanderlust,  We are refreshed that our team made an emotional connection with you when you stayed with us.  We look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Best Hotel for the price in Costa Mesa!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel while in Costa Mesa! Was attached to South Coast Plaza, so it made shopping and eating easy! The staff were great and always willing to accommodate you. Hotel was clean and well maintained. It's close to the highway so was perfect for visiting Laguna Beach, Newport Beach, and Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Anthony O,  We are glad to hear that our team assisting you in your accommodations and you felt we met all your needs.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Utterly disappointing and overpriced - Stay away!
Summary: Let me start by saying that my stay was company paid so I got to 'enjoy' this experience for free. (between $200 and $300 a night) Having said that, I was still very disappointed with this hotel. Where do I start?  1- The self-parking structure is in a building ACROSS THE STREET! on the FIFTH FLOOR! 2- The hotel side entrance facing the above parking structure is LOCKED (even at 5pm after work) . You have to walk ALL THE WAY around to the front to enter the hotel to get in.  3- There is no breakfast buffet! I have never heard of such a thing. A hotel with no breakfast buffet should be banned! haha  4- Their restaurant where you could get breakfast is overpriced and half the things on their menu were unavailable.  5- The modest breakfast for one that I did order cost over $30 !
Manager Response: Dear FrakN,  Thank you for your feedback.  Our apologies that your needs were not met on your visit.  We hope that we will get another opportunity to deliver for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel! So close to the airport, super clean, excellent service. The pool area is beautiful.. I loved going up there in the evening and looking at the stars. I loved that it was walking distance to the mall.. great shopping and amazing restaurants. A couple of tips.. you can get drinks/food delivered poolside if you just call a number, so bring your smartphone up there. And, there was a sign you could put on your door saying you didn't need new sheets.. we didn't realize we were declining housekeeping entirely. Duh. It was a bit of a disappointment and entirely our fault. All in all an excellent stay.. can't say enough about the pool!
Manager Response: Dear Jenn R,  Our team is dedicated to delivering experiences that are memorable and lasting.  We are glad to hear that you felt our pool environment made your stay special. Look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, 5 stars level of service.
Summary: I have stayed at handful of different Westin hotels all over the world and this is certainly one of the better ones that I have stayed at, in particular the level of service that I have received.  Location wise, it is perfect for the tourist. It is not far from John Wayne Airport, and it is right across from South Coast Plaza, great for shoppers.  Next to various famous Orange County dining venues such at Scott's Seafood, Pinot Noir (in house restaurant that have won many awards), Mastro's Steakhouse to other affordable dining such as TGI Friday's and In & Out Burger.  There is a big Japanese market Mitsuwa across the freeway (walkable about 15 mins) which features one of the best and cheapest Japanese food and produces in Southern California.    The hotel itself features a nice
Manager Response: Dear Doraemon79,  Our team is dedicated to delivering memorable experiences and it is truly refreshing to see that they delivered on your stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel in a perfect location. The rooms are very quite and there are plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. I recommend this hotel over the others in the area. Very clean. They also have an airport shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Sean A,  Thank you for staying with us.  We truly value you as a guest and look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed during some sort of cheer leading competition, so the hotel was busy.  Service was average, the front desk gal had no idea what or where the Pelican Hill Resort was...Tom Fazio would love to hear that since he designed one of their golf courses.  Rooms are average Westin fare, except for the builders pink tile in the showers....TACKY.   No SPG suite upgrade and none offered until I asked.  Oh, sorry, were fully committed.   Overnight self park is a laughable $20 and valet something like $35.   The Fairmont isn't that far and the service level is much better for Presidents Club members. If you can get a rate of say $100 - $125 then it is what it is, but otherwise I would be inclined to stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear PDXStocks,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your visit.  We look forward to our property refresh which will take place next year.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to meet your needs on another visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Hits and Misses - will stay again
Summary: I enjoyed my stay, so I am sure that most others will too if you like the Westin brand details: white tea scent, orchids, zen contemporary furnishings in lobby. Good surprises: the room view towards Disney provides a night time display of fireworks that you will also hear a little (boom, boom), beatutiful sunset and moon and stars view from the nicely designed pool area, delicious room service provided within 30 minutes with healthy gourmet and vegetarian options, quick responses to any service call, nice garden and bridge walking to shopping with restaurants, art (Noguchi environmental exhibit), and concert hall.  Unfortunate surprises: could hear guests in room next door, small bathroom with older design which includes shower curtain for tub-shower combo, self parking $20,
Manager Response: Dear CarrieJ808,  Thank you for letting us know exactly what areas of services hit and missed for you.  We truly appreciate your feedback and will continue to dedicate our focus on delivering superior service and great product.  We hope to see you on your next visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Don't expect this to be high end experience of the Starwood brand.  The rooms were plain, the amenities were okay and there was no additional services for platinum members.  The rooms are clean and the customer service is great.  I was informed that hotel will be going through a major upgrade in the recent future so maybe there is something else to look forward to.
Manager Response: Dear P D,  Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We strive to deliver experiences to our guests that are memborable.  We are looking forward to our remodel and hope that we get another opportunity to deliver for you.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: My only SPG hotel option in the airport submarket
Summary: I travel to OC frequently for business and have family nearby so pleasure on the docket.  As a platinum SPG member this is my usual business hotel when in the area.  Although I continue to stay there this hotel always leaves me a bit flat.  It has improved since the renovation a year or two ago but its the little things that are never quite right. The rooms and bathrooms are reasonable large but have no real personality and for the price point and level of this hotel they should stock little things like bath wash rather than soap only.  Also the air conditioning never quite seems to get cold enough and on this particular stay my A/C would automatically shut off in the morning, which I didn't notice until the humidity following my shower wouldn't go away and I realized the room
Manager Response: Dear Greg K,  Thank you for letting us know of the opportunities we need to improve upon.  We are dedicated to enhancing your experience so you can look forward to your stay with us.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great location for what we were doing. Easy access (by LA traffic standards) to Huntington Beach, Newport Beach, Santa Monica, Venice Beach etc. A highlight for us was Santa Monica Pier area. If you like to shop, don't miss the South Coast Plaza located directly across the street. We did not have near enough time to fully enjoy the mall. It is awesome and next time I would set aside a chunk of time to fully enjoy it. Rooms were clean, easily accessible. As with most large hotels in big cities, the parking fee is ridiculous, but I guess it is just a fact of travel.
Manager Response: Dear bkjjk,  We are refreshed to hear that you enjoyed our location for your visit.  We look forward to having you with us again. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Westin adjacent to South Coast Plaza for our second time for 2 nights checking in on 07/21. We arrived late on the 21st, about 9pm and everything was ready for us, keys and all. We received the same room as the 1st, room 311, a large corner room with 2 Double Beds (not Queens...) and the room was clean and nice, a typical Westin room. The room overlooked the business park across from the valet entrance and the bridge to South Coast Plaza, nothing overtly special. One odd thing I noticed in the room was the air conditioner. At night, due to a lack of movement, the air conditioner would turn off and the room was would just start to bake. Next day, we had maintenance come by and they turned off the motion sensing function. I feel like that was taking being
Manager Response: Dear AustinBeachO,  Thank you for your positive feedback and your opinions on our sustainability practices.  We can always make accommodations for you to avoid having the air conditioning only in use for movement.  We have the ability to modify our system to be on during your stay should that be your request.  Thank you for recognizing Irma.  We will make sure she knows how she made your visit feel.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have used this hotel many times in the past few years to conduct businees with clients in southern California. Food and the bar are great value. Great location and the staff is great. Right off the 405 and across form the south coast plaza mall.
Manager Response: Dear cchriscap,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt the hotel was a good value.  We truly appreciate you staying with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We were looking for a quick getaway to Southern California with easy access to Huntington Beach. This was exactly what we were looking for. It was a quick 20 minute drive to the beach where we proceeded to get nice and sunburned. I would definitely return to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Lilmooman,  We are refreshed to hear that our location met all your needs during your stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin South Coast Plaza is conveniently located across the street from South Coast Plaza, and next to Segerstrom Concert Hall and the Segerstrom Center for the Arts.  As you enter the hotel, the front desk is located to the right.  Although there were three front desk agents, and only one other guest checking in, the other two front desk agents weren‚Äôt very proactive in helping customers.  One front desk agent walked away while the other was helpful once the check-in process began.  The lobby is somewhat small, and missing was the flavored water located in most Westin hotels.  Upon entering the room, the bathroom is located to the right.  The bathroom is on the smaller side, but there is ample counter space.  They must have taken leftover tile from the Brady Bunch to tile
Manager Response: Dear TheMysteryT,  Thank you so much for your valued feedback.  We strive to provide memorable experiences and truly are thankful that you have given us your feedback so we can continue to improve our services.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very nice Hotel, well equipped and quite new. As preferred guest I had a wide room at top floor, but all the Hotel looked very nice. Room quiet and well equipped, breakfast quite good. very useful for John Wayne airport or South Coast Plaza mall or if you're travelling for busness in that area...don't go there if you're looking a place for a nice holiday with your family: much better if you find something in the cities close to the coast
Manager Response: Dear fanharuka,  Thank you so much for letting us know that we met your business needs.  We hope to see you on your next business travels. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel is great, the pool was extremely relaxing, the bar has a wonderful patio with an incredible multi-step waterfall coming down from the second floor and the rooms are perfectly westin.  Michael is a great manager and gave us a great welcome as always.  The hotel has a great area to walk your dogs  (unfortunately ours didn't get to go for the weekend) and is located right near Fashion Island and South Coast Malls.  With only a 15 minute drive to Laguna Beach (when there is no traffic) and next to so many theatres right outside the door, this is an INCREDIBLE value.  My only issue would be the $20 overnight self parking.  I wish that parking were included in the room rate, but then again, we all wish that.  Great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear palmspringssd,  Thank you so much for providing your positive feedback.  We will make sure our team is made aware of your recognition on how they deliver service to our valued guests.  Thank you for staying with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Not impressed with check-in process: having a trainee check in a Platinum SPG member with a barrage of questions is not the best way to go. Gym needs fans/better air conditioning, as does the restaurant, which has also has poor acoustics... enjoy listening to the conversations all around you. Adequate but not highly satisfying.
Manager Response: Dear STHoward84,  Our sincere apologies that you were not welcomed appropriately.  We value you as a Starwood Preferred Platinum member and understand how important it is to have a seamless experience when you travel as much as you do.  We will take your feedback and ensure that we work on how we deliver service.  We hope to see you again at our hotel. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed overnight after a day at theme parks.
Summary: Enjoyed a restful nights sleep after a full day at Knott's.  Room was spacious and clean. The bathroom amenities were on par with this class of hotels.  Their heavenly bed truly was a blessing as I slept straight through till morning.  Only downside I could say about this place was that parking seemed quite expensive.($20 self park, $30 valet)  the self park option wouldn't be so bad except the parking structure was across the street separate from the hotel.  Peet's coffee and Specialties bakery was close enough for a short walk for a morning cup of joe.  Looking forward to staying here again on my next visit to SoCal.
Manager Response: Dear Dayy19,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We are delighted to hear that you had a restful night sleep when with us.  We hope to see you on your next visit to our hotel. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Our room had dated, nicked furniture and was plan old tired.  Definitely an older Westin.  View from room was awesome and the French restaurant on the premises was excellent.  I had the best charcuterie plate I have ever had, the service was perfection.  It was the highlight of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Chris H,  We are refreshed to hear that you had a great experience at our Pinot Provence restaurant.  We will make sure they know that it was the highlight of your trip. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: First time here! Great property! convenient to Beach..airport...groceries..car rental. Great Staff! Even pet friendly! The pool view rooms also overlook a great waterfall! Honor bar in room! They will provide refrigerator if requested! Maids were very helpful. Filling my coffee station with the items I prefer! Room service was prompt and affordable! The beds are sooooo comfy!
Manager Response: Dear Warehouse2,  We are uplifted by the fact that you felt the property was a great experience for you. We hope to see you on your next visit.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great attention to detail and a 5 Star Staff
Summary: How to take a very large hotel and turn it into something special?  Ask the staff at The Westin South Coast Plaza.  I was truly amazed at the level of service here.  Our front desk check in person was so helpful, and I really felt welcomed.  The room was perfect.  Great bed with world class bedding, and all the amenities one could imagine.  Impressive WIFI.  Flat panel TV.  We ordered a pet package for our dog.  A beautiful "Heavenly Dog Bed" was awaiting, along with a placemat and two stainless steel dishes for 'bowser."  We ordered room service for an early breakfast.  Wow.  Nice job in the kitchen.  A delicious full American breakfast and a hearty Continental Breakfast.  The fresh fruit bowl was really fresh, as in fresh picked, sweet and delicious.  The assorted pastries
Manager Response: Dear DDB760,  Thank you for letting us know that we connected with you and made your stay memorable.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I spent very little time at the hotel as I was out at 8am -6pm everyday, there for an hour to freshen up and then out for the rest of the evening, arriving back at 1-2pm every day to sleep. It was just what you need after a long day; lovely shower with constant hot water, huge bed which I have to say is one of the most comfortable beds I've slept in at any hotel and the rooms were really quiet. We spent one evening sat by the fountain in the courtyard area/lobby for a few drinks although this was ridiculously overpriced so I wouldn't recommend this to others when there are places nearby. Can't comment too much on the restaurant either as we only ate there once for breakfast which was also very overpriced! All in all, for a business trip, I'd highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear JUK5, We are glad to hear that you had an excellent business stay when with us.  We hope to see you on your next stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Fine hotel that could be so much more
Summary: I took awhile to write this review, as I've stayed at this hotel often.  It gets points for convenient location, but there are a bunch of other hotels in the area. Every time I'm there I just find that the service isn't up to scratch for a Westin. Too many times I've had to schelp my bags around. Too many times I've had to wait for someone to park my car at night. Too many times I've run into some huge group (last time it was some event & Glady Knight, who was Pip-less) in the lobby & had to dodge & weave my way around them. This really isn't a good business hotel, which is unfortunate if you want an SPG property in the Costa Mesa/Irvine/Newport Beach area (and the St. Regis is outside your corporate budget). It seems they cater more to shoppers & those attending local events.
Manager Response: Dear ilovemanhatta,  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We truly appreciate you letting us know your many experiences at the hotel.  We take pride in genuinely addressing feedback so we can deliver exactly what will make your stay memorable.  We will share your feedback so we can provide The Westin experience that you deserve.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It was a great location for a conference with lots of restaurant and shopping choices within walking distance.  Take advantage of the pedestrian bridge that connects hotel with South Coast Plaza Shopping Mall and lots of great restaurants.   Now the room itself is nothing to write home about.  In fact my first room had missing grout around the tub plus mold and mildew.  The manager was shocked about this.  I was moved to another room and the room was taken out of the inventory.  He was very nice and apologetic about it. Bottom line is LOCATION LOCATION.
Manager Response: Dear Mollygee,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We glad to hear that our location met your needs.  It is refreshing to hear that our team addressed your concern immediately and we took action.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to provide you with an exceptional experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A little disappointed by this one: popcorn ceilings, incredibly poor sound insulation, dated bathrooms, and banged up elevator cabs.   I was awakened at 9 AM by the sound of my next door neighbor talking on his phone. I have better room to room sound insulation in my 1960s built home.   On a positive note: the room itself was nicely appointed, the common areas were nice, and the location is next to South Coast Plaza if that is your thing.    Overall, a little overpriced for what it really is.
Manager Response: Dear DanielG12,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  You will be delighted to hear that we are anticipating an room renovation next year.  We hope that you will be back to experience our hotel again.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: As a Platinum Starwood member there were some plusses and minuses at this property.  I was upgraded to a larger corner room that was exactly what I requested.  The only downside was there is no Club lounge and was offered some coffee or something in the little market they had.  BTW it closes early in the evening if you need something from little store.  They have a great pool and gym.  The pool was decent for a hotel pool for lap swimming.    The hotel is walkable to South Coast Plaza.  The only other downside was the expensive parking which was $30 for vallet and $20 for self.
Manager Response: Dear Larry G,  Our hotel is truly a great Westin.  We look forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: One night was not enough to enjoy this Westin
Summary: We checked in Sunday June 16 for just one night.  Sophia who checked us in was very professional and nice.  When she found out it was our twin's birthday that day, she sent up a card, four cookies and four glasses of milk.  That was very unexpected and a very nice gesture on her part.  The room on the fifth floor faced the pool and had those wonderful Westin Heavenly Beds.  Everything was clean and the pool was nice and heated so the kids got to swim.  There was a fee of $20 for parking and the internet in the room was extra.  We were across the street from shopping and dining at the South Coast Plaza and close to the freeways.It was a convenient location with great customer service.  I wish I could have stayed the next two nights of our trip but we had reservations at a
Manager Response: Dear justtravel,  Thank you for staying with us.  Travel should always be enjoyable and we are glad to hear that you had just that at our hotel.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Westin is a good and comfortable hotel ideally located next to South Coast Plaza shopping mall.   We had had a long flight into Orange County Airport which is close by, and the hotel perfectly matched our needs.   South Coast Plaza gives plenty of dining choices, and there is a coffee shop in the lobby for breakfast coffee and pastries.  Free internet available in the lobby.  Only downside is $20 for parking in an adjacent lot, but billed to you room. Such a pity that you can't park in the shopping mall lot overnight free of charge.
Manager Response: Dear Leesw8,  We are delighted to hear that you felt the hotel was comfortable and an ideal location.  We look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located for access to restaurants and shopping on foot - always desirable to offer alternate options to hotel dining. The lobby is aesthetically pleasing with a dramatic waterfall view (sculptural, not natural) behind the bar area and art all around. The rooms are nicely appointed. The beds and bedding were deliciously comfortable. We had a light breakfast at our meeting, which included yogurt, fruit and a granola, that was excellent. I inquired about the location of a nearby garden which the prominent sculptor Noguchi designed. The staff was unfamiliar with it, yet it was only a few blocks away.  I would have offered 5 stars had the hotel offered 2 things I think luxury hotels should include for the rates they charge- free in room wireless internet and
Manager Response: Dear Debra G,  Thank you for staying with us for your seminar.  We appreciate your feedback on how we can deliver for your experience in the future.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the area.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Amazing staff, outstanding large, clean, classy room, spectacular city views, beautiful facilities. My only negative is that it's not super close the the beaches and 405, but the mall is incredible! I stayed 4 nights and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Supaflyjoy,  We take comfort in knowing that you had an excellent experience with our team and we look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: we had a great one night stay for our anniversary.  Brian Kim added by sending up a hand written note with some chocolate covered strawberries!  perfect way to add to the evening.  very nice touch!! thanks Brian
Manager Response: Dear g m,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We will make sure Brian is recognized for you he made you feel.  Look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: The Best hotel next to to my favorite mall!
Summary: Wow, such a fab Westin! This is our go to in the OC. Easy, nice, clean and the staff is super friendly. Prime location next to South Coast Plaza. Also a great place for meetings and events. The staff is so helpful with everything!
Manager Response: Dear Ckohn,  We are glad to hear that we are located conveniently to your favorite shopping destination.  Our team will be excited to hear that you felt they treated you well. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great staff, very friendly and I can count on excellent service.  They are predictable in a very wonderful way!!  Front desk is cordial, helpful and so completely professional.  I like the artsy Wyndham as well, they need some tips from this hotel why Westin is superior in customer service. Starwood cares about return business and professionalism
Manager Response: Dear Sunnynlajolla,  We are delighted to hear that you feel our staff and company truly show genuine care when you stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent business hotel in Orange County
Summary: Stayed here for a business trip and felt like it was a great hotel for those purposes.  Very clean and quiet rooms and located walking distance away from a large upscale shopping mall and restaurants.  Also 2 minutes from the freeway so easy to get on the road from here.  Exercise room was adequate, service was good and there is a Starbucks to get a quick breakfast.  Although great for business travel, probably isn't as good for families or vacationers - pool area is small and centered and offers little for privacy.  Dining options are a bit limited as well and the exercise area is too limited to hold your attention if you were staying for an extended period of time
Manager Response: Dear BigLeagueC,  Thank you for staying with us.  We look forward to your return. We look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Westin Suncoast Plaza this trip. Conference hotel was in monarch beach, but St Regis was $150 more more per night so I decided to safe the co money. Was average overall, wish I spent the extra for the St Regis. No breakfast to speak of, very small gym... Average.
Manager Response: Dear TinoK61,  Thank you for staying with us.  We value your feedback. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stay here twice a month.  Staff is great from the time I pull up at the valet.  Great little fitness area and pool.  Adore the restaurant, Pinot Provence (restaurant is closed on Mondays).  Walking distance from the best mall in Southern California and a great performing arts complex.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear CalGirl86,  It is a pleasure to hear that our hotel is your favorite business stop.  Look forward to seeing you again. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have stayed at the Westin for years when in this area for business. The hotel is located across the street from the upscale South Coast Plaza shopping mall. Name the restaurant and it's there. Easy access to the hotel from freeway. Easy drive to Disneyland and Angels Stadium. We also drove to Huntington Beach and Newport Beach. Great location with so much to do in the area. We went on vacation with 3 other families and we all enjoyed our stay at the Westin. The hotel pool is deep. There isn't a hot tub but that isn't a big deal compared to the other nice amenities. Valet parking is $8.00 more per night than self-parking. Both are really easy to use. We will continue to stay at this hotel for business and pleasure trips.
Manager Response: Dear LG2Pro,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Look forward to your return. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Decent hotel in very good location convenient to all majr highways and easy access to the south and north. Valet is a bit pricy for the service but it is California after all and any way to make a dime they will. I wouldn't rush back to this hotel however it was clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Dear eweinz22,  Thank you for staying at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to deliver on your expectations.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Perfect location for business. Staff was quick and helpful. Easy check In. Nice, standard Westin rooms.  Scott's and maestros both close by for a good dinner. 4 mins to airport. It's easy to find, right off the highway. Can't find much wrong.
Manager Response: Dear JCFFB,  We are delighted to hear that your business needs were met when you visited our hotel.  We look forward to your return visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: If you are attending Fabulous Fords Forever, don't stay at Knotts
Summary: My wife and I attend the Ford show every year at Buena Park. Since our last nightmare staying at Knotts Berry Farm Hotel we have decided to try other venues. For the first year now we started at the Westin in Costa Mesa. The room was very nice. The grounds were extremely well kept. There is a wide variety of stores and restaurants a short walk  wawy and over the walking bridge called the Sky Walk. The staff was very courteous as well. The only negative for us was the fashion show occuring the same weekend. Fortunately for us the music stopped right around 10 PM. Overall a pleasant experience. At least we have a great start to our replacement hotel list for Knotts.
Manager Response: Dear John_in_vega,  Thank you for staying with us.  We truly appreciate your feedback. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice lobby with restaurant and bar, very friendly staff. Room was clean, comfortable and large.   The location is great close to shopping and many restaurants. The fitness centre was adequate, several treadmills, elliptical machine and a bike, a cable machine and some free weights.  Only downside was the exorbitant parking fee.  Would stay again and recommend to others but caution would about parking fee.
Manager Response: Dear deislandman,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza Hotel.  We value your feedback.  We strive to deliver experiences that are memorable.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: My Go-To Hotel in Orange County
Summary: Okay, I am a bit biased because I love the South Coast Plaza mall, and having a bridge leading to that mall from this hotel makes me happy.  Another thing that makes me happy is the Westin signature fragrance that lightly and tastefully permeates the hotel.  The same fragrance is present in their lotion and other toiletries.  In fact, I have bought their toiletries online because it is probably my absolute favorite scent.  Rooms and beds are nice.  Have not heard neighbors through walls (my biggest peeve in hotels).  Great service from most of the employees.    As others have mentioned, the parking fee is offensive.  There seems to be plenty of open spots in the parking garage, but there is a charge for self-parking, as well as valet.  I believe all hotels should offer their
Manager Response: Dear Lisa V,  Thank you for letting us know how you felt during your recent experience.  We value your opinion.  We are glad to hear you will be coming back. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We drove up to the hotel and were offered valet parking for an additional $30. We declined only to be charged $20 for the privilege of parking in a garage across the street. This would have been acceptable if we had known in advance but we did not. Perhaps the most irritating part of our stay is that we were charged extra for wifi. In this day and age it should be included in a hotel of this caliper. The room was clean and fine.
Manager Response: Dear arlyjb,  Thank you for your feedback.  Our apologies, that your experience did not meet your expectations. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed here for one night for work and it was a very fine hotel. My room was spacious and clean, though the bathroom was starting to look a little over-used. There is a large pool and very nice gym that overlooks the pool area. I stayed here for business, so didn't get a chance to use many facilities other than the treadmill. It's always nice though to use a hotel gym in an open space that isn't just a closed off hotel room! We ate in the restaurant which had great service and pretty delicious meals as well. Everyone was friendly and the location was prime for what I needed.
Manager Response: Dear Kate G,  Thank you for staying with us at The Westin South Coast Plaza hotel.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I will be brief.  On the 3rd day of our stay, a Sunday, my wife and I spent the afternoon at the pool.  It was a beautiful day, the pool was quiet, and very relaxing.  We had tickets to see "Billy Elliott" next door at the Arts Center.    When we returned to our room at 5pm, starting to clean up for the show, we discovered that there was NO HOT WATER.  I called down to the Customer line to report the problem.  The woman at the other end of the line apologized and said we should have received a letter mentioning that the boiler was being repaired and there would be no hot water from noon until midnight. Unfortunately, there was no notice, no voice mail , no letter and no sign in the lobby mentioning this 'slight' inconvenience. The assistant manager apologized, and offered to
Manager Response: Dear Jim90068,  Our deepest apologies that you had this unfortunate experience.  We value you as a Starwood Preferred Gold member and will ensure that we take your feedback to improve the service we provide to our valued guests.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to deliver for you.   Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: South coast plaza at your door
Summary: I have stayed here several times and always enjoyed it.  The room is big and comfortable although time for some improvements.  Staff is friendly although the most I ever got to try was a quick coffee even though they have coffee service in the room.  Hats off to the hotel for $1 water for convenience when everyone lose wants to make a killing on water. As others mention valet parking a little pricey.  Convenient for SNA, Southcoast Plaza, and more.  I would definitely return but I would not pay extra to stay here
Manager Response: Dear Rich W Thank you so much for staying with us.  We hope to see you on your next stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel Rooms Aging, But Fantastic Location
Summary: I've probably stayed at this hotel 30 times over the last six or seven years.  He lobby was remodeled about five years ago and it is pretty nice.  There are nice amenities and a fountain that adds to the ambiance, but the location is the best thing about this hotel.  It is located 10minutes north of John Wayne (Orange County) Airport and is quickly accessible from the 405.  It is directly adjacent to the South Coast Repertory Theatre and across the street from one of the finest shopping malls you will visit.  In Southern California that is saying something!  Costa Mesa in situated very near Irvine and provides short commutes to Irvine and even Anaheim (Disneyland), although there are lots of other options if Disney is your primary destination.  This is primarily a business
Manager Response: Dear Wolverine325,  Thank you for your recent visit with us.  We truly appreciate feedback on our valued guest experiences.  We do have complimentary internet in the lobby for our guest use.  We hope that you will come back and visit us on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is an average hotel with poor service. The rooms are good and they were clean. The bar area was good but the food over priced for " bar food".  The real issue is that there is very little service especially since the price of the hotel is very high. There are lots of other hotels in the are that are better.
Manager Response: Dear postrawb,  Thank you so much for your feedback on your recent visit.  Our team takes pride in delivering superior service and we will make sure they receive your feedback so we may deliver on that promise.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night for a wedding at the hotel.  The room and parts of the hotel were a bit worn and dated (especially the bathroom), but our room was clean and comfortable.  All of the staff were friendly and we were able to check in early (around 1pm) to get ready for the wedding, which was a plus. The only reason for the 4 star rating is the food.  For convenience, we ate at the hotel several times (afternoon appetizers at the bar, for the wedding, late night room service, then brunch the next morning in the restaurant) and the food was always mediocre and overpriced.  I would recommend going elsewhere to eat, as there seemed to be a lot of options nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Sofie H.,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your visit.  We hope that you will give our hotel another opportunity when you travel to our area.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A friend and I stayed at this property using SPG points.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The offered my friend the choice of an extra amenity with her stay:  a drink at the bar, extra SPG points, or free internet.  I still find it unbelievable that Starwood properties charge for internet service in the rooms.  We stayed on the 10th floor away from the elevators, which was nice.  The ice machine is not near any of the rooms, which is a plus for everyone.  It was on the far side of the elevators.  When I walked into the room I was happy to see modern furniture, bathroom fixtures, and countertops.  Everything was clean and the bed was comfortable.  There was free Starbucks coffee and some tea in the room.  Did not touch the water bottles and snacks on the desk
Manager Response: Dear Denise A,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay with us.  We value your opinion.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to deliver on your experience. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A detailed statement of the problems and issues encountered has been forwarded to Westin Hotels Headquarters. Suffice it here to say that this property did not meet minimum expectations. The desk staff,  while courteous, was uncaring and did nothing to resolve the major issue (which could have been easily resolved by changing our room). I will stay at a competitor whenever possible before I will ever stay at another Westin property following this negative experience.
Manager Response: Dear George C,  Our sincere apologies that you felt we did not recover from your experience at the hotel.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for your feedback.  Guest Relation Manager

Summary: I hosted a 30-40 person event here over several days and had a great experience. The accommodations were very good, the staff was always helpful, friendly and cheerful. The catered food was excellent. I got lots of positive feedback from the attendees.  My only criticism is that there is only one restaurant in the hotel. While it was a good restaurant, I was stumped a couple of times regarding when they were open and when not. Mitigating factor is that there a many restaurants in the area, accessible with a short walk.
Manager Response: Dear Jefisan,  Thank you for choosing us for your event.  We value your feedback regarding to your visit.  We are glad to hear that your experience went well.  We hope to see you on your next event or leisure stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Okay Stay, but a rip-off on Valet Parking
Summary: I don't normally stay at this hotel and prefer the Fairmont, but we thought we'd give another hotel a try, give it's close to the Mall and my girlfriend wanted to shop on our last day.  Some things are nice- the coffee shop that has the great breakfast sandwiches is very convenient if you're in a hurry and the food standards are very high.  The reason I gave the hotel such low marks is because we arrived very late Thursday night, for three nights, yet the hotel had the gall to charge four days for valet parking at $28.00 a night.  That's a rip-off!  I have a hard time with hotel scams like this and while they may get my $28 dollars for that extra night, they won't see me back ever again.  Another thing that's deceptive- They offer you a $5.00 credit for not cleaning the room
Manager Response: Dear TommyJames,  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  Our apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to deliver on your experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was extremely pleased with this hotel. The staff was superb. The room was quite large and very comfortable. The hotel is expensive,but it is in a very upscale area. It is well worth the cost.The restaurant was excellent. I look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff G,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  Look forward to your return visit.

Summary: Stayed here last week on a pleasure trip (graduate school reunion with some friends). Very friendly front desk with easy check-in. A pricey stay but understandably so. I would suggest to all hotels at this price level that a cell-phone, laptop and Ipad charger be part of the in-room work desk setup. These devices are ubiquitous and most travelers forget one or all of them. This would also be a great marketing tool for the hotel. All in all a pleasant trouble-free stay.
Manager Response: Dear Leo G, Thank you for staying with us.  A traveler needs to have those trouble-free stays to feel renewed and refreshed when away from home.  Glad to hear that we were able to make this happen for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: There's nothing really better so i guess Westin Costa Mesa wins for the area
Summary: I stay here quite frequently and its an adequate hotel.  The building is old, probably early 80s and while reskinned still not up to Westin quality.  Bathrooms (tubs) are old (and they have those gross rubber safety mats) with the old 1980s ceramic tiles but they put the new Westin Elements brand square shower head with hand shower.  The bathrooms are tiny, I hate having to put the towel on the toilet back so that I can reach from the shower since there is no room for towel bars as the towels are under the sink.  The carpet is new and they even touched up the paint, but again all average.  The food offerings, on the other hand, are overpriced and below average.  Breakfast is attrocious and they don't have a club lounge for platinums.  The bar/lounge in the lobby is again average
Manager Response: Dear Seat31E,  Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding your experience at the hotel.  We continue to work hard to maintain our hotel to The Westin standard and appreciate your feedback regarding your impression you had when staying.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Was here on business and found the Westin very comfortable.  If you like shopping, its right next to South Coast Plaza.  The gym is way too small for the size of hotel.  This area has a lot of corporate HQ surrounding so a big business traveler hotel.  If you do not like to shop at the mall.  Then you will need a car to get around as not much retail business close by.
Manager Response: Dear Dontyouknow58,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We are delighted to hear that it was comfortable for you.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Has potential, needs makeover and service improvement
Summary: The location of this property is great if you are needing to stay in the OC area. Across from one of the best malls in California (South Coast Plaza), easy access to 405 and John Wayne airport. The pool/garden area is nice, considering the location. The actual property however, especially the rooms are dated and average. Breakfast is ok, there is a buffet and menu. The checkout process was a terrible experience for me. First, they had charged me for wifi even though we determined at check in that it is included in my corporate rate. Second, they had offered green choice at check in which I agreed to, but there were no points added for green choice when I checked out. Two issues that had to be rectified at check out. The worst issue was that it took the valet service half hour to
Manager Response: Dear Exotic _Flowe,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your visit.  Our sincere apologies for your experience upon your departure from the hotel.  It is clear we need to review how this was handled for you and improve how we respond to our valued guests in such a situation.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to know how you felt during your visit so we can coach our team. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: First and foremost, the hotel location near the South Coast Plaza (across a bridge) and Segerstrom Hall (next door) makes it a very convenient hotel if you need to go to these places.  There is no other hotels in the area that is as convenient as The Westin.  The staff is excellent.  The hotel entrance is (suprisingly) located at the back of the hotel.  There are several excellent restaurants within walking distance, so we did not have a chance to try the hotel restaurant.  We were a little disappointed at their little coffee stand...ran out of pastries by 0800am.  Only other glitch was our room was not ready until 5pm, not a big deal for us since we just went shopping at South Coast Plaza, but if you are traveling in after a long flight, it could be annoying.  The rooms are
Manager Response: Dear ppts,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your stay.  We value you letting us know how our team made you feel.  We look forward to your return visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed here at least  40 times over the last 15 years.  It is a very nice hotel.  Location is good and close to some restaurants/shopping.  Being there on business, not much free time. So, it was nice to come back to the hotel and the clean rooms that are nicely appointed.  I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear marie C,  Thank you for staying with us at the hotel.  We hope to see you on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Was looking for a lot more
Summary: This hotel was chosen for a 2 two day conference by my company and it was not up to me where we stayed. I wonder if I wold have chosen here if I had the ability. First of all, I travel enough that I know when the front desk is bluffing. Being a SPG member and for many years, sometimes it shocks me to see the way in which your requests are handled. Upon arrival, which was very early in the day, closer to lunch time, I checked in to find out my reservation was in the computer twice. I did not know how that happened but I am sure the rooms were not necessarily on the same floor or even same type of room. I had asked if I could be placed on a higher floor with a good view, as usual, and stick with my usual king bed. The desk agent's response was a tad rude and condescending,"we have
Manager Response: Dear cityboyctr,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your stay.  We value you as an SPG member and apologize we did not meet your needs for your stay.  We will share your feedback with our team so we may improve our services.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed on three different occasions at this property and was never disappointed. The location couldn't be more perfect: high-end shopping mall, highway exits, airport. The staff is extremely helpful and knowledgeable especially when it comes to suggesting local dining. When in the area this is my choice of stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tsvet73,  Glad to hear that you felt our team was helpful and knowledgeable during your stay.  We look forward to your return stay with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was at the Westin on a business trip and found the service and friendly staff such a delight. The rooms were very clean and well appointed. They took care of every detail and made our stay very special. Great location with South Coast Plaza just a few minutes away, great restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Doodis,  Our team takes pride in taking care of the small details to make our guest experiences special.  I am glad we could do this for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed for a conference, good for the 4 star level. Comfortable, they worked with me to make sure that I am pleased.  Good rooms, comfy bed. Shower is a bit small but overall a good stay. Would recommend someone staying by airport in OC.
Manager Response: Dear Anna S,  Thank you for staying with us.  Staying at a hotel and feeling comfortable and relaxed is essential to traveling.  We are glad that we could deliver on your experience.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay at this hotel, top notch actually.Lovely room, excellent Internet, extremely friendly staff with great customer service.The Westin heavenly bed is delightful and after a 14hour flight from Sydney it was very welcomed.The location is so close to South Coast Plaza, just a 5 minute walk or even less. This was our second stay over the last couple of years and it will not be our last!
Manager Response: Dear JanSydneyAu,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that you felt the service was top notch.  We look forward to your return stay. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed at this property for a recent conference and was delighted in the great hospitality receiveed from their staff members.  From the front desk to the valet everyone went out of their way to assist me and offer me information that I could use during  stay.  Room and bed were great, very close to everything.
Manager Response: Dear graciegirl,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent visit.  Great to hear our team made your stay pleasant.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The staff was very pleasant and professional. The room was rather large and comfortable. The internet service was never an issue, always a positive, in my opinion. The location is excellent. I truly look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew P,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us.  Look forward to having you with us on your next visit. Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Business hotel steps from South Coast Plaza & Performing Arts Center
Summary: Great business oriented hotel with very professional & well trained staff.  As a Platinum member I was treated as such.  Had a noise issue soon after check-in and was immediately moved to a nice suite on the 16th floor.  Internet was NOT a problem - worked fast and well for me.  Parlor and adjoining sleeping room was well appointed (as was the original park view room I had on the 10th floor).  Love the new heavenly rain shower head. Comfortable Heavenly Bed as usual. One note for the Platinums among us - don't do the "Grab & Go" breakfast - go for the points instead.  I understand they are working on getting an upgraded breakfast in the near future.  Great fitness facility & pool. Will return.
Manager Response: Dear SFDutchman,  Thank you for your loyalty as a Starwood Preferred Platinum member.  Our team takes pride in making sure our valued elite members receive the best service possible.  Glad to hear we made an impact on your visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Can't wait for another Girl's' Night Out at the Westin!
Summary: I planned a Girl's' Night Out on Friday, February 16.  Christina and Doug made our night very memorable.  Not only did Christina upgrade to a Jr. Suite make the party, we were welcomed with a cheese platter.  I stayed an additional night with a friend and Doug was more than helpful in assisting with finding us restaurant options.  We couldn't be extended for a third night under the hotel's buy two nights, get one free so we stayed nearby in Irvine in another 4 star hotel.  No comparison to the Westin all around.
Manager Response: Dear hrtsafr,  It is so important to be able to get away and have fun with friends.  We are delighted to hear we were your getaway destination and that you felt our team made your experience a memorable one.  We look forward to your next time with us. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I must confess that this is one of the best locations a hotel can ever dream of having. Just steps away from my company office, south coast plaza mall, an array of fantastic restaurants, The Westin South Coast plaza is a no brainier when having business or pleasure planned in OC.   As a traveler who stays in a hotel close to 200 nights a year, I have made this property my home away from home during business travels. They always cater to my needs and have a good eye for details. Convenient gym and pool for relaxation, in addition to a nicely stocked bar.  PROS: 1. Amazing Service from the likes of April C., Joyce C, Joe, Michael, Tom, Doug and almost every worker at this property. 2. Fantastic Location  CONS: Shabby internet in most rooms and suites Some rooms need a little
Manager Response: Dear Olumakin O, Glad to hear we are your home away from home.  We take pride in providing a hotel experience that meets all of our guests needs.  Thank you for your feedback regarding our internet and our guest rooms.  We have enhanced our WiFi since your vist so we look forward to you being able to see the difference.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The service was great, the room was comfortable, the "free" breakfast was --- not up to my standards. If you're gold or platinum, then take the points, and not the breakfast of raisin bran, yogurt and coffee.   The concierge was helpful, and the parking is apart from the hotel. The valet is worth it for this reason, particularly when it's raining as it was the day we departed the hotel.   Scott's Seafood is a favorite and only a few minutes walk.  Internet is "funky" and all hotels should go to the Kimpton solution which is join the loyalty program, enter an email when you checkin in, and "voila" --- it all works for as many devices as you care to use.
Manager Response: Dear drpsych_calif,  Thank you for letting us know that our location is what was key to your visit experience.  We recently upgraded our WiFi at the hotel and look forward to you staying with us to experience the improved experience.   Guest Relation Manager

Summary: Located just steps away from the South Coast Plaza shopping center and the Orange County Center for the Performing Arts, this hotel is right in the heart of it all in the OC.  The hotel was refurbished about 10 years ago.  Rooms are still nice, as is the lobby, restaurants.  Nice pool and gym as well.  Easy convenient location right near the junction of 405 and 55 freeways.  Also close to Newport Beach, Laguna, Disneyland, Anaheim Stadium. We have stayed at this property numerous times over the past 10 years and recommend it for its value, location, and quality at a very reasonable price point.
Manager Response: Dear Steven C,  We appreciate your feedback regarding how the location in Orange County met all your needs.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope that we will see you on your next visit.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: If you are going to be flying into John Wayne Airport, or need to be in Orange County for business, this is a great hotel. Not just because its a Westin, and you can rely on a comfortable stay and clean room, but because of location.  The hotel connects by footbridge to South Coast Plaza mall, and you are footsteps away from some of the greatest restaurants in the area including Seasons 52, Charlie Palmer's, Capital Grille, Scott's and more. Of course you can also get some great shopping done at a number of high end department stores. This is a great bonus plan, especially if you do not have a rental car and are using the hotel's airport shuttle.  As far as the hotel goes, it is a clean, modern, business hotel. Nothing resort about it. Everything is catering to a business
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here once a quarter for the past few years.  Stays have ranged from a few days to two weeks.  This Westin is better than average for the brand in many ways.  I keep coming back maily due to the location as my office is across the street and the hotel makes my trips seamless.  If you have business at one of the buildings within a few blocks, this is a hotel that you can actually stay at without a car.  Free Westin shuttle will pick up and return to SNA, often in a town car or SUV, every 1/2 hour.  Nice upgrade from a beat old hotel van.    This property has huge swings in occupancy.  Last minute rooms can be hard to get or it can be empty.  I've had to contact the business manager on a few occasions to use Plat status to force a room.  They got the room and they even
Manager Response: Dear SPGwanderlust,  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback regarding to your numerous stays with us.  We look forward to your stays with us when you are in the area.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient but rooms a bit dated
